tls:text.tls:line: In conduct there is such a thing as being reliably excellent;

sense.def: demeanour

tls:text.tls:line: In conduct there is such a thing as being reliably excellent;

sense.def: regularly; invariably; in perpetuity; permanently, constantly

tls:text.tls:line: In conduct there is such a thing as being reliably excellent;

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:text.tls:line: in office-holding there is no such thing as reliably meeting with success.

sense.def: entering service as an official; official career of any kind; official career whatever it is

tls:text.tls:line: in office-holding there is no such thing as reliably meeting with success.

sense.def: regularly; invariably; in perpetuity; permanently, constantly

tls:text.tls:line: in office-holding there is no such thing as reliably meeting with success.

sense.def: meet the right cirucumstances> be in the right place at the right time; be in time; be lucky

tls:text.tls:line: is a matter of natural talent;

sense.def: promising faculties, promising talents

tls:text.tls:line: is a matter of the right time.

sense.def: timeliness; being in time; the right time; the appropriate season

tls:text.tls:line: If one's talents are of a high order and one's actions are pure,

sense.def: be morally elevated; be high-minded

tls:text.tls:line: If one's talents are of a high order and one's actions are pure,

sense.def: be of a superior order

tls:text.tls:line: If one's talents are of a high order and one's actions are pure,

sense.def: be unsullied, without blemish; clean

tls:text.tls:line: If one's talents are of a high order and one's actions are pure,

sense.def: morally pure

tls:text.tls:line: then it cannot be guaranteed that one will necessarily end up in a distinguished position;

sense.def: consider as necessary > guarantee that S

tls:text.tls:line: then it cannot be guaranteed that one will necessarily end up in a distinguished position;

sense.def: venerated and/or noble> distinguished

tls:text.tls:line: if one's abilities are slight and one's conduct is morally unclean,

sense.def: be (temporarily) able to

tls:text.tls:line: if one's abilities are slight and one's conduct is morally unclean,

sense.def: be slight, and of little significance, insubstantial; slight (not splendid 美)

tls:text.tls:line: if one's abilities are slight and one's conduct is morally unclean,

sense.def: conduct, way of behaviour as something deliberately cultivated

tls:text.tls:line: if one's abilities are slight and one's conduct is morally unclean,

sense.def: be morally defiled

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Someone may have elevated talents and pure behaviour,

sense.def: by some chance, by any chance, as it happened

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Someone may have elevated talents and pure behaviour,

sense.def: be morally elevated with respect to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Someone may have elevated talents and pure behaviour,

sense.def: be immaculate and morally pure with respect to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: he will be held back and remain at a low level;

sense.def: remain in a demoted/low position; fail to obtain high position, be held back (in a low position)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: he will be held back and remain at a low level;

sense.def: of lower quality, of the lower kind; inferior

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if one has slight abilities and impure behaviour

sense.def: be weak with respect to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if one has slight abilities and impure behaviour

sense.def: be impure with respect to (behaviour etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: he will be placed above the crowd.

sense.def: (abstractly:) be present in (a person); consist in; belong to; reside in

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.2; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: he will be placed above the crowd.

sense.def: the subject of being many> the crowd, the many people; the mulitudes of the people; the hoi polloi

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Each generation has its own way of selecting candidates for office,

sense.def: generation 三世 "three generations"; one's own time; our own time; (e.g. the present) age, historical period; historical conditions; specifically: a period of thirty years.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Each generation has its own way of selecting candidates for office,

sense.def: each (in his own way); each their separate (and typically different) object

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Each generation has its own way of selecting candidates for office,

sense.def: opt for, choose (a thing, an abstract thing, or a person for a job), show preferences for

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: failing to advance is because one does not meet the right opportunities.

sense.def: lack of good fortune

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If one occupies a venerated position or a distinguished office,

sense.def: be located in (a place); find oneself in (a condition, at a time); occupy (a position or an office); place oneself (in a position or place)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If one occupies a venerated position or a distinguished office,

sense.def: elevated social status; venerable position

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If one occupies a venerated position or a distinguished office,

sense.def: distinguished high social position

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: it is a matter of being in the right place at the right time;

sense.def: being in the right place at the right time; meeting the right circumstances

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if one's rank is low and one is in a low position,

sense.def: one's concrete rank in the hierarchy; respectable formal position in society

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: some holding onto their impure behaviour,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: some holding onto their impure behaviour,

sense.def: embrace; carry in one's arms, carry along in one's arms; hold in one's arms

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: some holding onto their impure behaviour,

sense.def: stagnant (water, pond); murky, dirty, infamous

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: would find honour in the court of a Jié;

sense.def: reach a level appropriate for a noble person, become more noble

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: would find honour in the court of a Jié;

sense.def: the royal court; the court

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: some maintaining their pure behaviour

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: some maintaining their pure behaviour

sense.def: persevere in and cultivate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: some maintaining their pure behaviour

sense.def: immaculate and morally pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: some maintaining their pure behaviour

sense.def: modesty, (female) virtue; probity; proper constraint, proper moderation; rules of decent behaviour

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: would find themselves in a lowly position at the court of a Yáo.

sense.def: be humble in attitude, submissive

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1.3; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: would find themselves in a lowly position at the court of a Yáo.

sense.def: court, royal court

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In some cases, normally worthy men come to aid the wicked,

sense.def: normally

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In some cases, normally worthy men come to aid the wicked,

sense.def: to help; be of use to; to support (normally rulers, but occasionally wicked persons or practices); to assist (the exercise of proper government)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In some cases, normally worthy men come to aid the wicked,

sense.def: the wicked

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in other cases, men of great talent follow the path of men of slight talent;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in other cases, men of great talent follow the path of men of slight talent;

sense.def: as a (e.g. single ruler to govern many subjects) (to V)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in other cases, men of great talent follow the path of men of slight talent;

sense.def: person of low talent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men who possess great talent differ in the purity of their ways;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men who possess great talent differ in the purity of their ways;

sense.def: all equally, all similarly; both

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men who possess great talent differ in the purity of their ways;

sense.def: relative purity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men devoid of moral standards get by on their skills;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men devoid of moral standards get by on their skills;

sense.def: skill, ingenuity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men devoid of skills or abilities gain favour on the strength of their good looks.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men devoid of skills or abilities gain favour on the strength of their good looks.

sense.def: skills and abilities of all kinds; one's skills; skill in general

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men devoid of skills or abilities gain favour on the strength of their good looks.

sense.def: female beauty; male or female good looks; sex; sexy looks; female charms

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in still other cases, men devoid of skills or abilities gain favour on the strength of their good looks.

sense.def: gain favour with one's superior

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: this is a case where men differing in conduct still served the same lord.

sense.def: differ from each other as to (e.g. customs etc) see also 異乎

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:1; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: this is a case where men differing in conduct still served the same lord.

sense.def: be the same with respect to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Sometimes the conduct is the same, but the ruler different

sense.def: conduct, way of behaviour as something deliberately cultivated

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Such was the case for Yī Yín and Jī Zí.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but Yī Yín became prime minister.

sense.def: become (ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but Yī Yín became prime minister.

sense.def: prime minister (in any country, including Chǔ 楚)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and Jī Zǐ a slave.

sense.def: slave (of either sex); enslaved male (often a foreign prisoner or a criminal)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: This was because Yī Yǐn happened to meet Tāng the Successful,

sense.def: successful

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Now if, as a talented person one serves a talented ruler,

sense.def: as a (e.g. single ruler to govern many subjects) (to V)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and the ruler wishes to practise good government

sense.def: good government; governing; matters of proper government

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and if the minister supports him with his talents,

sense.def: to help; be of use to; to support (normally rulers, but occasionally wicked persons or practices); to assist (the exercise of proper government)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and their choices in action coincide,

sense.def: opting for and opting against, opting for or opting against; choices, preferences

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and their choices in action coincide,

sense.def: be completely the same

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if, as a talented person one serves a bad ruler

sense.def: wicked

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and if as a minister one aids him through loyal behaviour,

sense.def: devoted, trusty (of persons and of actions); doing his best

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and if as a minister one aids him through loyal behaviour,

sense.def: help with (the charioteering); assist in (government) assist in an official capacity (as aide, a person of superior status); ZHOULI: assist (the king) [support][CA]

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and their conduct and aspirations are in conflict with each other,

sense.def: be conflicting

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and their conduct and aspirations are in conflict with each other,

sense.def: contrary, perverse; be at odds with each other; be at loggerheads

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and their conduct and aspirations are in conflict with each other,

sense.def: be at odds with each other, be in conflict with one another

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Sometimes as a superbly distinguished minister

sense.def: talented or even sagely> of the highest distinction

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: one comes across a ruler wishing to conduct proper government

sense.def: run into a person, come to meet a person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but in the end somehow does not meet success.

sense.def: in the end; to the very end; finally

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Such was the case of Confucius and Mencius.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius was short of provisions between Chén and Cài,

sense.def: fall short of, come to lack; be cut off from so as to lose control over

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius was short of provisions between Chén and Cài,

sense.def: grain, provisions; food rations for travel; provisions, rations

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Mencius got into trouble in Qí and Wèi.

sense.def: be in desperate state; be in straights;

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It was not that the rulers did not employ qualified persons;

sense.def: seasonable, seasonal 時雨 "seasonal rain"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It was not that the rulers did not employ qualified persons;

sense.def: rulers

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It was not that the rulers did not employ qualified persons;

sense.def: those who are capable and competent; those who are excellent; those who are more distinguished/of greater excellence

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: it was rather that their talents were of a low order and their understanding shallow,

sense.def: be of lower quality, of the lower kind; be inferior; be of inferior moral mettle

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: it was rather that their talents were of a low order and their understanding shallow,

sense.def: superficial, shallow; narrow

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and that they thus were unable to employ men of great talent.

sense.def: men of great talent, highly qualified persons

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Now anyone able to steer a Jì Lù steed

sense.def: drive (carriage, horses)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Now anyone able to steer a Jì Lù steed

sense.def: outstanding horse

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: must be a Wáng Liáng.

sense.def: Leading specialist in driving carts; A person like Wáng Liáng, i.e. a leading specialist

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Anyone able to use an Yǔ, a Jì or a Gāo Yáo as minister

sense.def: gain as a minister; make into a minister; take as a servant

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Anyone able to use an Yǔ, a Jì or a Gāo Yáo as minister

sense.def: a person like Yǔ

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Anyone able to use an Yǔ, a Jì or a Gāo Yáo as minister

sense.def: Ji4, prehistoric minister

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Anyone able to use an Yǔ, a Jì or a Gāo Yáo as minister

sense.def: a person like Gāo Yáo

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: must be a Yáo or a Shùn.

sense.def: invariably; (e.g. be knowable) with certainty; reliably, with inevitable reliabilty; (know) for certain; with logical necessity;

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: must be a Yáo or a Shùn.

sense.def: a person like Yáo

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: must be a Yáo or a Shùn.

sense.def: a person like Shùn

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: A hand able to control a horse that runs a hundred lǐ a day

sense.def: excellent horse

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: to try controlling the feet of a horse capable of running a thousand lǐ a day

sense.def: steer and control properly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: to try controlling the feet of a horse capable of running a thousand lǐ a day

sense.def: a fine horse that can travel a thousand lǐ a day

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: is sure to suffer disasters such as that of broken yokes.

sense.def: break off

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: is sure to suffer disasters such as that of broken yokes.

sense.def: yoke of a carriage

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: is sure to suffer disasters such as that of broken yokes.

sense.def: break off; take off (an ear); have (one's ribs etc) broken

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: is sure to suffer disasters such as that of broken yokes.

sense.def: yoke of a carriage

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: is sure to suffer disasters such as that of broken yokes.

sense.def: serious trouble, misfortune; resulting trouble (from one's actions) 三患"three kinds of disaster"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If someone with a talent sufficient for handling fill-in ministers

sense.def: strike up relations with, make contact with (a person); communicate with; handle

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: uses this to keep under control the wisdom of great ministers

sense.def: control (others); have control over (things)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Thus when perfect proposals are rejected

sense.def: perfect, consummate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Thus when perfect proposals are rejected

sense.def: be discarded

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and men of excellence is repudiated

sense.def: be refused

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: this is not because rulers hate men of excellence,

sense.def: detest; harbour strong dislike

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: or because they have no taste for perfect proposals.

sense.def: FIND SAVOURY> appreciate; have a taste for; have a proper sense for; taste with pleasure, enjoy

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The point is that men of excellence aim high

sense.def: aim for; be mainly concerned with as one's task, concentrate on, concentrate one's efforts on; strive for (success); be concerned to; devote one's efforts to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The point is that men of excellence aim high

sense.def: moral superiority; high aspirations

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Now, when a person of great talent seeks employment with a person of small talent,

sense.def: as, in one's capacity as 以編戶之民 "as a simple person from an ordinary home"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Now, when a person of great talent seeks employment with a person of small talent,

sense.def: men of great talent, highly qualified persons

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Now, when a person of great talent seeks employment with a person of small talent,

sense.def: go after, seek, do everything to obtain

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Now, when a person of great talent seeks employment with a person of small talent,

sense.def: person of low talent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Sometimes when as a minister of great talent,

sense.def: of great talent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: meets a ruler of great talent,

sense.def: of great talent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: it is only then that the possibility arises both for meeting and not meeting with success.

sense.def: then and only then

tls:text.tls:srcline:
虞舜、
許由、
太公、伯夷是也。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2-3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn and Xǔ Yóu, Tài Gōng and Bó Yí2 are cases in point.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn and Xǔ Yóu were both sages,

sense.def: all equally, all similarly; both

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn and Xǔ Yóu were both sages,

sense.def: a sage; any sage (with tensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: both were born in the age of Táng rule,

sense.def: shoulder to shoulder, together, side by side; momentaneously; at the same time; 十日並出

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: both were born in the age of Táng rule,

sense.def: generation 三世 "three generations"; one's own time; our own time; (e.g. the present) age, historical period; historical conditions; specifically: a period of thirty years.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: both were born in the age of Táng rule,

sense.def: all

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and both came face to face with Yáo.

sense.def: be in the presence of as a servant, meet face to face (as a servant) 面於

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn continued the imperial line,

sense.def: continue; expand (intelligence/understanding)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn continued the imperial line,

sense.def: tradition

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: rose together in the kingdom of Zhōu,

sense.def: come into existence, be born

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: As to men of excellence, their way was the same, their aspirations convergent, and their choices were along the same lines,

sense.def: be the same in kind; be identical

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: As to men of excellence, their way was the same, their aspirations convergent, and their choices were along the same lines,

sense.def: (of several subejcts) be basically all the same, be in concord, be in harmony, to converge

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: As to men of excellence, their way was the same, their aspirations convergent, and their choices were along the same lines,

sense.def: preferred course of action

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: As to men of excellence, their way was the same, their aspirations convergent, and their choices were along the same lines,

sense.def: be well-aligned> be basically the same

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but the actions of Yú Shùn and Tài Gōng were matching,

sense.def: fit well together> be consistent with each other

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and the conduct of Xú Yóu and Bó Yì was at odds with each other,

sense.def: be inconsistent with each other, be contrary to each other; fail to fit the circumstances

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: they were not born in the proper age,

sense.def: the right kind of, the appropriate, the relevant, the suitable 其人

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but within this sameness there was a difference;

sense.def: sameness, identity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but within this sameness there was a difference;

sense.def: different and strange characteristic

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but within this convergence there was divergence.

sense.def: sameness

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but within this convergence there was divergence.

sense.def: discrepancy and conflict

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: aspirations may be pure or impure.

sense.def: relative purity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: was an assistant to an August One,

sense.def: assistant; helper; senior aide; most important minister

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: was an aide to an Emperor,

sense.def: an assistant 王者之佐

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but he emerged in an age of mere kings.

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Both followed high standards of morality

sense.def: all, both

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Both followed high standards of morality

sense.def: take as one's starting point, start out from; follow as a path or course of action

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: When the rulers practised their high standards of morality,

sense.def: enact; implement as an official; carry out as a morally responsible agent; put into practice, practise, carry out; operate according to; implement (a law) and apply it to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then if they were less than pure, such men would not stay with him.

sense.def: SHI, SHU: remain, stay

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: When the rulers practised goodness,

sense.def: undertake; do deliberately (something right or something wrong), commit (a crime etc); act out (a virtue); conduct (government); engage in (thievery); set out to do

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then if they were not high-minded enough, such men would not remain with him.

sense.def: desist, not go or get through with a planned action; stop one's habitual action

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Actually, Yáo was less than spotless, and Shùn had dirty hands,

sense.def: murky and dirty (CC); be less than spotless

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Actually, Yáo was less than spotless, and Shùn had dirty hands,

sense.def: mixed with impurities and sediment; impure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Tài Gōng, in his punitive expeditions, was violent.

sense.def: launch a punitive expedition

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: They were equally tainted and crude.

sense.def: equally, in the same way

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Thus when Shùn governed the world,

sense.def: rule over as king

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Gāo Yáo assisted him in his administration,

sense.def: help with (the charioteering); assist in (government) assist in an official capacity (as aide, a person of superior status); ZHOULI: assist (the king) [support][CA]

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: whereas Běirén Wúduò hid himself completely and did not show himself;

sense.def: deeply (understand), into depth (MENG: of ploughing)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Bó Yì aided him in his rule,

sense.def: to help; be of use to; to support (normally rulers, but occasionally wicked persons or practices); to assist (the exercise of proper government)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Bó Yì aided him in his rule,

sense.def: good government; governing; matters of proper government

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: whereas Bó Chéng Zǐgāo, having discarded his office, turned to tilling the fields.

sense.def: relegate to another place, send away; abandon, give up; disregard as unimportant

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: whereas Bó Chéng Zǐgāo, having discarded his office, turned to tilling the fields.

sense.def: one's concrete rank in the hierarchy; respectable formal position in society

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:3-4; Beida ; Yang 1999: 3; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: whereas Bó Chéng Zǐgāo, having discarded his office, turned to tilling the fields.

sense.def: to turn to tilling the fields

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It is not that the talents of Gāo Yáo surpassed those of Wúduò

sense.def: gift, talent 多材

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It is not that the talents of Gāo Yáo surpassed those of Wúduò

sense.def: be superior in relation to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: or that the abilities of Bó Yì exceeded those of Zǐgāo,

sense.def: exceed in quality

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In the cases where they advanced in service, it was because their actions fitted [those of the rulers],

sense.def: fit the circumstances; happen to fit the circumstances

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in the cases where they withdrew into obscurity, it was because their conduct differed [from that of the rulers].

sense.def: be inconsistent with each other, be contrary to each other; fail to fit the circumstances

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In the cases where they withdrew into obscurity, their circumstances were not the same.

sense.def: constellation of power; propensity of things; natural tendency; strategic constellation or structure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: They personally may have been of low status,

sense.def: bend> be humbly flexible

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: they had no wish to advance.

sense.def: hope that; wish one could; wish one could have; aspire to; would like to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and go on to reject them

sense.def: reject, dismiss; disregard, fail to obey (orders); discard; eliminate, remove

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: this is just a case of the two lacking mutual admiration.

sense.def: be full of admiration for (an ideal, a value, a thing); sometimes also: strive towards as one's main ambition; yearn for

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: The fact that Shāng Yǎng gave advice to Duke Xiào of Qín three times,

sense.def: advise, try to persuade someone to do something

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: and the first two pieces of advice were not listened to,

sense.def: persuasion, attempt to persuade; effective rhetoric of persuasion

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: and the first two pieces of advice were not listened to,

sense.def: be listened to, be followed (as advice)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: but the last was accepted,

sense.def: get followed (of advice) (parallel to tīng 聽 "get listened to")

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: presented a line of argument suitable for emperors or kings,

sense.def: royal leaders; royal leader

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: presented arguments for those aspiring hegemon.

sense.def: a hegemon worthy of his title; a typical hegemon

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: presented arguments for those aspiring hegemon.

sense.def: a memorial or formal declaration

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: Now [1], when one maintains line of argument suitable for emperors or kings

sense.def: (carrying along)> with

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: and presents these as advice to a ruler who is bent on becoming a hegemon,

sense.def: of the kind of a preeminent ruler 霸者之主

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: then even the best advice will be pushed aside;

sense.def: be of exquisite quality, of choice quality

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: then even the best advice will be pushed aside;

sense.def: passivising grammaticalised particle derived from a transitive verb

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: then even the best advice will be pushed aside;

sense.def: be pushed aside, get opposed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: but when one switches to advice about becoming a hegemon

sense.def: switch to; change into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: then even the crudest advice will be accepted.

sense.def: coarse and vulgar; be uncouth

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: then even the crudest advice will be accepted.

sense.def: (figuratively, transferred sense:) be unsubtle, be coarse LIJI 10.32 coarse (of ceremonies); LIJI 10.39f: coarse (of people)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: then even the crudest advice will be accepted.

sense.def: get accepted (of advice)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: This was because the best advice happened to involve what Duke Xiào did not want to have;

sense.def: something excellent (e.g. an excellent subtle proposal)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: and the crude advice encountered what Duke Xiào wished to put into practice.

sense.def: something ordinary and unpolished

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: Convincing talent does not depend on worthiness as such,

sense.def: ZZ 1: depend on (something or somebody)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: The rhetoric of the groom was without professional method,

sense.def: groom

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: The rhetoric of the groom was without professional method,

sense.def: persuasion, attempt to persuade; effective rhetoric of persuasion

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: The rhetoric of the groom was without professional method,

sense.def: basic method, basic orientation; specialist method; definite method; by extension: definite point

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: but the country folk liked them;

sense.def: find fully satisfactory, delight in as ideal; be delighted with; appreciate positively 甚悅之

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: Zǐ Gòng's rhetoric was full of meaning,

sense.def: objective main idea; 本義 "basic intended objective meaning"; objective meaning

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: A piper produced an excellent tune

sense.def: pipe

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: A piper produced an excellent tune

sense.def: specialised worker; craftsman, artisan; sometimes specifically: musician

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: A piper produced an excellent tune

sense.def: outstanding, excellent (e.g. a tune); proficient; of superior quality (clothes)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: A piper produced an excellent tune

sense.def: music; a piece of music

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: he changed this into an uncivilised tune

sense.def: change it; chang the contextually determinate object

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30; red.

tls:text.tls:line: he changed this into an uncivilised tune

sense.def: rustic; country style; uncivilised

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故為善於不欲得善之主，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, in the case where one produces something good for a prince who does not wish to get good things,

sense.def: make/produce (physically), construct build (a platform, a house)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故為善於不欲得善之主，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, in the case where one produces something good for a prince who does not wish to get good things,

sense.def: something excellent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: what one produces may be excellent, but it will not be loved.

sense.def: passivising grammaticalised particle derived from a transitive verb

tls:text.tls:srcline: 為不善於欲得不善之主，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and in the case where one produces something worthless for a ruler who happens to care for worthless things,

sense.def: wickedness, bad actions; an action that is not good

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: what one produces may be worthless, but it will not be disliked.

sense.def: be detested

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: This is congruence through parochial skills.

sense.def: parochial, local

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: This is congruence through parochial skills.

sense.def: entertaining trick, attractive skill [also general: skill in any field][CA]

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1:3; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999: xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If one achieves such congruence then one will meet with the right opportunities

sense.def: succeed under the circumstances; happen to succeed; "make it"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: recklessly they managed to conform to their superiors' ambitions through their cunning,

sense.def: craftiness of any kind

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: recklessly they managed to conform to their superiors' ambitions through their cunning,

sense.def: the leadership, the authorities; one's ruler, the ruler; superiors; persons in high position

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: recklessly they managed to conform to their superiors' ambitions through their cunning,

sense.def: one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The minister who stole the hair-pin,

sense.def: hairpin which holds headgear

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and the retainers who crowed like cocks are cases in point.

sense.def: cock

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The minister who stole the hair-pin

sense.def: snatch away; misappropriate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: gained favour with the lord of Mèngcháng.

sense.def: enjoy the affections (or sexual favours) of a ruler (or superior) (sometimes with institutional subjects)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Mèngcháng was fond of the retainers who faked the cock-crows.

sense.def: artificial; pretended; fake, faked; pretending; faking

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:2; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: the rulers relied upon them;

sense.def: SHU: depend on politically (as on a powerful person), depend on (for life); derive profit from 甚賴之

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but they were liked by their rulers.

sense.def: the leadership, the authorities; one's ruler, the ruler; superiors; persons in high position

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Jí Rú and Dèng Tōng were cases in point.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Jí Rú was favoured by emperor Xìao Hùi,

sense.def: happen to enjoy special favour; be shown special favour 幸於

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Jí Rú was favoured by emperor Xìao Hùi,

sense.def: be so fortunate as to enjoy the sexual attentions of (a superior, typically a ruler)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and Dèng Tōng was loved by Xiào Wén.

sense.def: be the object of the sexual attentions of; enjoy the sexual favours of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and Dèng Tōng was loved by Xiào Wén.

sense.def: be loved, be beloved; be the object of sollicitous care

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: These men did not even have the least trace of talent

sense.def: fine and tenuous; slight, insubstantial

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: These men did not even have the least trace of talent

sense.def: slight; unsophisticated

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It just so happened that because they cut a fine figure and were of delicate build,

sense.def: by chance; by pure chance; without planning; without proper planning

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It just so happened that because they cut a fine figure and were of delicate build,

sense.def: outstanding, of excellent appearance

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It just so happened that because they cut a fine figure and were of delicate build,

sense.def: build, overall shape of body

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It just so happened that because they cut a fine figure and were of delicate build,

sense.def: Sima Xiangru: refined and attractive

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: their skin was captivating and their appearance was attractive.

sense.def: beguiling, seductive; pleasing; be beguiling

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: their skin was captivating and their appearance was attractive.

sense.def: be attractive

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:4-5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and their actual success was certainly to be expected.

sense.def: success

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It may happen that some people with ugly faces and repulsive looks,

sense.def: physically ugly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It may happen that some people with ugly faces and repulsive looks,

sense.def: face

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It may happen that some people with ugly faces and repulsive looks,

sense.def: ugly; nasty (e.g. disease)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It may happen that some people with ugly faces and repulsive looks,

sense.def: expressive appearance, air

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: were thought to be attractive by their rulers.

sense.def: be regarded as attractive

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Mó Mǔ and Wú Yán were cases in point.

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Mó Mǔ gained advancement under Húang Dì,

sense.def: be promoted, gain promotion

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and Wú Yán was accepted as a consort by the king of Qí.

sense.def: be accepted (e.g. by a ruler)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Thus whether someone does or does not have the relevant talents may be ascertained beforehand

sense.def: beforehand, ahead of time; in good time; in advance

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but when it comes to meeting the right opportunities it is hard to make effective plans ahead of time.

sense.def: at an early stage; in good time, before it is too late

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but when it comes to meeting the right opportunities it is hard to make effective plans ahead of time.

sense.def: consider carefully one's plans concerning (some action); reconsider one's plans concerning; consider concrete future action in detail, make concrete plans and arrangements as well as decisions about; make a considered decision;

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and when it comes to what a subject offers up there is no telling beforehand;

sense.def: know beforehand

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: What happens to match the ruler's fancies will count as right

sense.def: by chance; by pure chance; without planning; without proper planning

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: What happens to match the ruler's fancies will count as right

sense.def: count as N, be Npr, be an N

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and what happens to be acceptable counts as superior.

sense.def: as it turned out in the event; by some coincidence 士適出 "this officer happened to leave the house".

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Those who advance in rank are not necessarily talented

sense.def: be promoted, gain promotion

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are held back are not necessarily bereft of talent.

sense.def: get demoted

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and if one fails to win the ruler's favour one will lose out.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Current opinion has it:

sense.def: the general public

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: "A man of talent is able to succeed,

sense.def: the worthy person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: "A man of talent is able to succeed,

sense.def: have the objective possibility of; be able to (under the circumstances) (short for 可以) FAYAN: 可南面

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and when he does not succeed it is surely his own fault.

sense.def: one's own; her own; his own

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and when he does not succeed it is surely his own fault.

sense.def: fault, moral responsibility for an unfortunate state of affairs

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If throughout one's live, not placing their hopes in others, one aims for the ruler's thoughts

sense.def: all one's life

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If throughout one's live, not placing their hopes in others, one aims for the ruler's thoughts

sense.def: place one's hopes in (loan for 睎, also written with heart radical)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If throughout one's live, not placing their hopes in others, one aims for the ruler's thoughts

sense.def: predict precisely, guess precisely HN 准上意 "guess the ruler's thoughts"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if one carefully observes the inner workings of the government,

sense.def: observe carefully so as to draw lessons from

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if one carefully observes the inner workings of the government,

sense.def: look at in order to learn from

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if one attunes one's abilities so as to determine one's advice,

sense.def: to blend properly, to make harmonious; tune up (instruments); attune (e.g. one's speech to circumstances etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:5-6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and if one is able to offer up things that are of help and assistance to the ruler

sense.def: ensure sufficient supplies for

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: people develop profitless abilities

sense.def: pretend to (abilities); pretend to be (the Buddha)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and they offer pointless advice.

sense.def: submit; hand in; offer up, hand up (bribes etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: When it is summer they offer a stove,

sense.def: at the time of N (preposition introducing time complements)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and when it is winter they submit a fan.

sense.def: submit (text or memorial) formally to the highest authorities; submit to the emperor

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and when it is winter they submit a fan.

sense.def: fan

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and they offer up talk that no one wants to hear.

sense.def: serve (food) politely (at meal)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and they offer up talk that no one wants to hear.

sense.def: talk; utterances (often derogatory)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If they do not meet disaster that is a matter of luck!

sense.def: 甚幸(of things) be a matter of good luck; be a a matter of pure luck; (of persons) have a stroke of good luck

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: What lasting good fortune can come from this?

sense.def: blessed happiness

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: What lasting good fortune can come from this?

sense.def: OBI: blessings from Heaven, divine succour (mostly written 祐)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Some people win a good fortune by doing something that is of no help

sense.def: OBI: blessings from Heaven, divine succour (mostly written 祐)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, by the way, in summer a stove may be used to dry moisture,

sense.def: season; periods of time as defined by the official calendar

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, by the way, in summer a stove may be used to dry moisture,

sense.def: oven; stove; fire pit

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, by the way, in summer a stove may be used to dry moisture,

sense.def: be in order to, be designed to; may be used to; serve the purpose of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, by the way, in summer a stove may be used to dry moisture,

sense.def: cause to be dry by heating

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, by the way, in summer a stove may be used to dry moisture,

sense.def: something that is moist

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in winter a fan to fan the fire.

sense.def: fan

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: One can successfully place one's hopes in people generally,

sense.def: by extension, occasionally: current opinion among one's contemporaries

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but a ruler cannot be predicted successfully.

sense.def: be guessed at precisely

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Advice may be changed around,

sense.def: get changed around

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but one's abilities cannot be exchanged for new ones.

sense.def: capability; physical capability, concrete technical capability; potential, capacity 人各有能

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but one's abilities cannot be exchanged for new ones.

sense.def: get replaced by someting else; get changed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: When the ruler of one's time is fond of literature

sense.def: the rulers of our time

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: When the ruler of one's time is fond of literature

sense.def: of the present generation; present, contemporary 世之學者

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30
