tls:text.tls:line: then if one devotes oneself to literature one will meet the right opportunity [in him].

sense.def: (contrastive:) oneself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then if one devotes oneself to literature one will meet the right opportunity [in him].

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: But when the ruler of one's time is fond of the military arts,

sense.def: the person in charge (of the contextually determinate N), sometimes used in transferred even more abstract sense: ruling agency, dominant force.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: But when the ruler of one's time is fond of the military arts,

sense.def: martial arts; martial skills; military accomplishment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then the very same person would fail.

sense.def: (contrastive:) oneself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then the very same person would fail.

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If a ruler is fond of rhetoric

sense.def: the person in charge (of the contextually determinate N), sometimes used in transferred even more abstract sense: ruling agency, dominant force.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If a ruler is fond of rhetoric

sense.def: convincing eloquence; rhetoric; rhetorical polish; rhetorical skill

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then if one is a good talker one will succeed

sense.def: colloquial: have good rhetorical talents

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: But when the ruler is not fond of rhetoric

sense.def: the person in charge (of the contextually determinate N), sometimes used in transferred even more abstract sense: ruling agency, dominant force.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: the very same man would not meet with the right opportunity.

sense.def: (contrastive:) oneself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:6-7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: the very same man would not meet with the right opportunity.

sense.def: he himself, she herself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: A ruler of literary inclinations will not be fond of war;

sense.def: being inclined towards the arts; specialising in the civil (rather than military) arts; having a liking for literature

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: A ruler of military inclinations will not be fond of literature.

sense.def: inclined towards the military, dominated by interest in military matters

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: A ruler who is inclined towards rhetoric will not be prone to activism.

sense.def: eloquent, well-spoken; LH 1: interested in rhetoric

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: An activist ruler will not be fond of arguments.

sense.def: action-orientated

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The literary arts and public speech

sense.def: the exercise of polite arts, polite accomplishments; external visible accomplishments; non-military accomplishments

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The literary arts and public speech

sense.def: discussion, discourse; public discussion, public speech

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: can still be practiced within reasonable time,

sense.def: still

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: can still be practiced within reasonable time,

sense.def: rapidly; LH 1: at reasonably quick speed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: can still be practiced within reasonable time,

sense.def: be properly rehearsed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: cannot be perfected at one go.

sense.def: urgently; drastically; abruptly; suddenly; at one go; for the moment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If in learning something one does not practise it persistently

sense.def: HANSHU: for a long time; from the start (cf. sù 素 "from the start")

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If in learning something one does not practise it persistently

sense.def: engage in relevant practising; engage in rehearsing things; engage in intellectual regurgitation

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: one does not havew what it takes to make one's name illustrious.

sense.def: make illustrious

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: And if one's name is not basically well-known

sense.def: be famous, be well-known

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: one does not have what it takes to hit it off with a ruler.

sense.def: have success with, become a success with; hit it off with

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In a hurried career

sense.def: hurried; momentary

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: And since one has not been heard of ahead of time,

sense.def: beforehand, ahead of time; in good time; in advance

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then how can one predict precisely the ruler's thought and offer advice accordingly,

sense.def: submit; hand in; offer up, hand up (bribes etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient times, among the people of Zhōu, there was somebody who, in his official career, several times failed to meet his right opportunity,

sense.def: numerous times, frequently; on several occasions; at frequent intervals

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: he was old and white-haired,

sense.def: colloquial: old

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: he was old and white-haired,

sense.def: be white-haired

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and stood crying on the road-side.

sense.def: weep

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and stood crying on the road-side.

sense.def: major one-track mud-road suitable for carts; road

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: "Why are you crying?"

sense.def: because of N

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: "In public office I have repeatedly failed to meet the right opportunities;

sense.def: gain employment; enter employment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: I am distressed that I have grown old and missed my time,

sense.def: be distressed that S

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: I am distressed that I have grown old and missed my time,

sense.def: worry about (oneself) that one V-s

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: I am distressed that I have grown old and missed my time,

sense.def: the right time; right moment, an opportunity 大時; the moment for something; see also 遇時 "encounter opportunities"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: "When I was young,

sense.def: in age, by years 年老 "old in age"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: "When I was young,

sense.def: be young

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In my studies I devoted myself to letters.

sense.def: try to learn to VERB

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In my studies I devoted myself to letters.

sense.def: undertake; do deliberately (something right or something wrong), commit (a crime etc); act out (a virtue); conduct (government); engage in (thievery); set out to do

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Only after I had achieved some success in my literary studies

sense.def: be completed and achieved; be brought to fruition

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: did I begin to think of taking an office,

sense.def: to begin to V; to be at the beginner's stage of V-ing

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: did I begin to think of taking an office,

sense.def: serve as an official

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but at that time the ruler was prone to using old men.

sense.def: a ruler of men

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but at that time the ruler was prone to using old men.

sense.def: be in the habit of; be prone to, tend to, have an inclination to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: but at that time the ruler was prone to using old men.

sense.def: MENG: person of old age

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: his successor went on to employ men of a military bent

sense.def: successor

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and I turned to the military arts.

sense.def: change or improve so as to V

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: But when I had begun to get somewhere with the military disciplines

sense.def: inclined towards the military, dominated by interest in military matters

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: he liked to employ young men,

sense.def: young person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Gaining official employment is a matter of opportunities,

sense.def: gain employment; enter employment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Gaining official employment is a matter of opportunities,

sense.def: entering service as an official; official career of any kind; official career whatever it is

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: then still success may elude one.

sense.def: still

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: How much more true is this for those who have the highest standards and exquisite aspirations,

sense.def: modesty, (female) virtue; probity; proper constraint, proper moderation; rules of decent behaviour

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: How much more true is this for those who have the highest standards and exquisite aspirations,

sense.def: be elevated and subtle

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: who are of stable character and whose substance is solidly established,

sense.def: natural inborn endowment, inborn nature, basic nature; natural condition, natural tendency; natural disposition, character; natural endowmentsBUDDH: in the Zen Buddhist context, xìng usually refers to one's 'Buddha-nature' (see fóxìng 佛性 ) (the inborn, naturally perfect and nature of each sentient being, overclouded (but not changed!) by the deluded activities of the mind)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: who are of stable character and whose substance is solidly established,

sense.def: be stable and fixed, have taken a fixed shape

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and who are therefore never even looked at by the ruler!

sense.def: marker of passive 為人戮，為天下笑

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: one's abilities cannot be set up in advance,

sense.def: be formally established

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: one's abilities cannot be set up in advance,

sense.def: beforehand, ahead of time; in good time; in advance

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and one's advice cannot be prepared beforehand.

sense.def: beforehand; previously; in the past; from the past

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and one's advice cannot be prepared beforehand.

sense.def: be properly established; be completely established

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: By accident, one may meet the ruler's pleasure,

sense.def: by coincidence

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: By accident, one may meet the ruler's pleasure,

sense.def: meet (the right object); be exposed to (the right person, times, etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: By accident, one may meet the ruler's pleasure,

sense.def: delight (in someone N), joy about (something N)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and thus may fall in with his ideas.

sense.def: by chance, as it happened

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and thus may fall in with his ideas.

sense.def: happen to run into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and thus may fall in with his ideas.

sense.def: idea, thought

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and then that is called meeting with right opportunities.

sense.def: meet the right cirucumstances> be in the right place at the right time; be in time; be lucky

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and thus obtains high status;

sense.def: general state of nobility

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:7-8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The word for such a case is 'careful estimation'

sense.def: estimating correctly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In spring one sows the seeds and the grain grows,

sense.def: in spring

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In spring one sows the seeds and the grain grows,

sense.def: do the sowing, sow the fields

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: In spring one sows the seeds and the grain grows,

sense.def: cereal; salary in cereal 榖不可勝食

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in autumn one cuts it and the grain is harvested.

sense.def: in autumn

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in autumn one cuts it and the grain is harvested.

sense.def: cut down plants in order to harvest them

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: in autumn one cuts it and the grain is harvested.

sense.def: get harvested, get reaped

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: If without having sought them things arrive of themselves,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: if without one having initiated projects they are realised of themselves,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It is like picking up things lost on the road,

sense.def: pluck up from the ground/street

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It is like picking up things lost on the road,

sense.def: what is left lying around for others to pick up; lost items

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: It is like picking up things lost on the road,

sense.def: major one-track mud-road suitable for carts; road

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: or like Heaven giving one something, the earth making something grow,

sense.def: make presents, confer something on others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: or like Heaven giving one something, the earth making something grow,

sense.def: produce a contextually determinate thing

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The spirit of Qín Xī indirectly brought (Bǎilǐ Xí) good fortune.

sense.def: subtle substance that makes up the soul; subtle essences; occasionally: spirit of a deceased person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: The spirit of Qín Xī indirectly brought (Bǎilǐ Xí) good fortune.

sense.def: secretly; in an indirect way; in hidden ways

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and the ghost of Bào Shū promoted a man through silence (Guǎn Zhòng).

sense.def: silently; without any use of words

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: When others happen to meet the right opportunity they go on to praise them

sense.def: basing oneself on, being in accordance with GUAN

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: When others happen to meet the right opportunity they go on to praise them

sense.def: to commend as outstanding; commend for (a good quality); express approval

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: and on the basis of someone not meeting with the right opportunity they go on to criticise him.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Such a case shoes that basing oneself on visible evidence and observable objective fact

sense.def: base oneself on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Such a case shoes that basing oneself on visible evidence and observable objective fact

sense.def: manifest proof, manifest evidence; a fact that can serve as evidence; symptom, indication; visible sign; proof in practice; proof

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Such a case shoes that basing oneself on visible evidence and observable objective fact

sense.def: take as a formal standard

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: Such a case shoes that basing oneself on visible evidence and observable objective fact

sense.def: accomplished, perfect

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot measure properly moral conduct and one cannot investigate effectively abilities.

sense.def: measure surface, weight, size, volume or abstract things; also LH: assess precisely (conduct)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 1; Liu 1990:8-9; Beida ; Yang 1999:xxx; Zheng 1999: xxx; Guizhou 1998: xxx; tr. Forke 1: 30

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot measure properly moral conduct and one cannot investigate effectively abilities.

sense.def: general talent, abilities (including moral talents and professional abilities)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: In general, officials in their career may be hampered and checked,

sense.def: entering service as an official; official career of any kind; official career whatever it is

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: In general, officials in their career may be hampered and checked,

sense.def: fail to make progress, be blocked

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: their conduct may be seriously flawed and quite imperfect,

sense.def: decent behaviour

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: their conduct may be seriously flawed and quite imperfect,

sense.def: flawed, full of mistakes; impaired

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: their conduct may be seriously flawed and quite imperfect,

sense.def: be perfectly present; be comprehensively developed; be in perfect shape

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: their offences may be allowed to accumulate and not be removed,

sense.def: accumulate things

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: their offences may be allowed to accumulate and not be removed,

sense.def: be removed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and their public recognition may remain obscure and not distinguished

sense.def: fame

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and their public recognition may remain obscure and not distinguished

sense.def: be undistinguished, be less than well-known

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: that their actions were inconsistent,

sense.def: be misguided, be incoherent (also of actions); look confused

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: that their intelligence was obfuscated,

sense.def: be murky, be dim; be dusky by extension: be confused, benighted

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: or that their strategies were benighted.

sense.def: be benighted, utterly ill-informed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: They just met external distasters beyond their control

sense.def: run into in various ways (disasters etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida 1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: They just met external distasters beyond their control

sense.def: non-insider, outsider; extraneous and independent of oneself; originating from the outside

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: all of them have to suffer misfortunes.

sense.def: all, each of the subjects

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: all of them have to suffer misfortunes.

sense.def: (be exposed to>) marker of passivisation

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: all of them have to suffer misfortunes.

sense.def: get damaged

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Such harm come from sources outside their control

sense.def: any kind of harm, any kind of damage

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Such harm come from sources outside their control

sense.def: OBI 3: come from

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: it does not come from within.

sense.def: come from, arise from; have as a basis

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Now if one does not get to the bottom of what harm arises from

sense.def: get to the bottom of, investigate fundamentally, investigate the reasons of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Now if one does not get to the bottom of what harm arises from

sense.def: from

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Now if one does not get to the bottom of what harm arises from

sense.def: arise

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and just attributes responsibility for harm to the sufferers of harm

sense.def: simply; without good reason

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 19; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and just attributes responsibility for harm to the sufferers of harm

sense.def: attribute (something N1) to (on someone N2) 歸責於被累害者 "lay the blame on sufferers"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: The (plant-)creatures of this world are born in spring

sense.def: (kind of) living creature 百物; 天物 "the creatures of this world that are from Heaven"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: But when they are ripe in autumn

sense.def: according to, in the way of (emperor Yáo etc); according to (the right season); at (a certain time)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: If for some reason oxen or horses trample on their roots

sense.def: for some reason or other; unpredictably; suddenly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: If for some reason oxen or horses trample on their roots

sense.def: tread on; step on deliberately; HF: come to step on (as someone else's toe or LIJI 1.27 on a threshold); step on (so as to ruin or make ineffective)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: If for some reason oxen or horses trample on their roots

sense.def: root, primarily root that grows horizontally

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: or if knives or sickles cut off the stems,

sense.def: sickle See 鎌

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: or if knives or sickles cut off the stems,

sense.def: cut off; cut into; cut up; metaphorical: carve out and cede (a piece of territory etc); cut out (a piece of meat, a piece of cloth for use in sewing);

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: or if knives or sickles cut off the stems,

sense.def: stem of a (smallish) plant, stem of a leaf

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: then what is born is not fostered up

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: then what is born is not fostered up

sense.def: be nurtured; be raised; be properly nurtured

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and they will not ripen in autumn.

sense.def: until

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: are exposed to harm and are not successful,

sense.def: reproduce, have offspring; give birth to things

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: When rice has been touched by rats ,

sense.def: get into (e.g. rats getting into rice)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: When rice has been touched by rats ,

sense.def: cereal; staple foodstuff; grain/rice based foodstuffsgeneral: a meal

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: it is thrown away and not eaten.

sense.def: discarded

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: it is thrown away and not eaten.

sense.def: be (justifiably) discarded

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: it is thrown away and not eaten.

sense.def: be eaten; be eaten up

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: The taste of rice that has been thrown away

sense.def: discarded

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: The taste of rice that has been thrown away

sense.def: taste, flavour

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: is the very same as that of unpolluted rice.

sense.def: be soiled; be dirty

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: is the very same as that of unpolluted rice.

sense.def: be the same; be equal

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and throws the rice away, refusing to eat it.

sense.def: eat the contextually determinate thing (on formal occasions)

tls:text.tls:srcline:
與彼不育之物、
不御之飯，同一實也，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: are the same sort of case as that of the plants not taken care of and the rice left uneaten.

sense.def: fed 不育之物 "creatures that are not properly nourished"

tls:text.tls:srcline:
與彼不育之物、
不御之飯，同一實也，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:20; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 20; Hunan 1997: 10; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: are the same sort of case as that of the plants not taken care of and the rice left uneaten.

sense.def: what is not eaten (on formal occasions)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: (Just) by cultivating oneself and regulating one's conduct,

sense.def: cultivate (one's own person)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: (Just) by cultivating oneself and regulating one's conduct,

sense.def: often reflexive: one's (own) person; one's (own) person and character; the Self; personality (as something cultivated by the gentleman); the character

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot attract good fortune,

sense.def: cause to come> procure; attract; bring in

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot attract good fortune,

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven or the ancestors); good fortune sent from above; fortunate circumstances

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot attract good fortune,

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and just through trembling fear and careful precautions,

sense.def: tremble and fear

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and just through trembling fear and careful precautions,

sense.def: be very careful

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: one can not avoid disaster.

sense.def: flee from; stay clear of; keep away from, get out of the way of, keep out of the way of; ZZ 37: (decide to) keep away from (high and low places); flinch before (an enemy); bypass and fail to consider (a candidate);

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: The arrival of happiness and misfortune,

sense.def: OBI 5: ominous sign, ominous event or phenomenon imbued with some disastrous supernatural significance

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: The arrival of happiness and misfortune,

sense.def: fortunate outcome of an undertaking; fortunate turn of events; happy outcome

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: The arrival of happiness and misfortune,

sense.def: occurrence

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: is a matter of good or bad luck.

sense.def: ZZ 1152: be fortunate, be lucky

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Because one gets good fortune not through one's own efforts

sense.def: emphatic or contrastive form of 其； (often but not always contrastive:) one's his/her/its own N; all of one's own (and special)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Because one gets good fortune not through one's own efforts

sense.def: non-referential, often contrastive: one's own 己力

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: Because one gets good fortune not through one's own efforts

sense.def: strenuous manual labour; meritorious effort, meritorious contribution; exercise of strength, powerful effort; contribution

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: therefore good fortune is called good fortune;

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven or the ancestors); good fortune sent from above; fortunate circumstances

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: therefore good fortune is called good fortune;

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: If misfortune does not come from oneself

sense.def: impersonal pronoun: one, oneself (as opposed to other things) 自我 (cf. 自我加冕 "be self-congratulatory)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: It arises from one's native country and from the court.

sense.def: native ares, villages, neighbourhoods

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: It arises from one's native country and from the court.

sense.def: royal court (apparently never used to refer to any concrete court of a concrete king)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: There are three kinds of disastrous entanglements deriving from the native country,

sense.def: read lěi: trouble, entanglement; encumbrance; complications; disastrous entanglements

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: and the calamites in the court.

sense.def: erupt into action, develop; erupt, emerge; develop one's skills

tls:text.tls:srcline: 古今才洪行淑之人，遇此多矣。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient and modern times men of tremendous talent and unimpeachable conduct have often run into this.

sense.def: expansive and large

tls:text.tls:srcline: 古今才洪行淑之人，遇此多矣。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient and modern times men of tremendous talent and unimpeachable conduct have often run into this.

sense.def: meet by coincidence; sometimes generally: get to meet, have the opportunity to meet (someone who is hard to meet, or whom it is a good fortune to get to meet); run into, be exposed to (situations)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 古今才洪行淑之人，遇此多矣。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:10; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.37

tls:text.tls:line: In ancient and modern times men of tremendous talent and unimpeachable conduct have often run into this.

sense.def: be frequent, be the standard case

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: Which are the so-called three misfortunes and which the three calamites?

sense.def: read lěi: trouble, entanglement; encumbrance; complications; disastrous entanglements

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: Which are the so-called three misfortunes and which the three calamites?

sense.def: specifically, ancestral harm; CC generally, harmful impact; kinds of damage done

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: In general, in their conduct,

sense.def: comport oneself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: people are unable to pay proper attention to choosing their friends.

sense.def: be careful in V-ing; take care to V [This is a clear case where vadV is indistinguishable from vt+V.]

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: people are unable to pay proper attention to choosing their friends.

sense.def: select (as a neighbourhood to live in); make a choice of; make a free and proper choice of, HF 6.3.30: choose freely (a ruler whom one wishes to serve)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: As for friends, when these have the same attitudes as they, they are on good generous terms with them.

sense.def: [my] friend, person of similar ideals

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and if they are estranged they will be full of resentment.

sense.def: be full of resentment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and they will have a negative impact on one's proper conduct.

sense.def: cause to be flawed, cause to be full of mistakes; impair, have a negative impact on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38b

tls:text.tls:line: those with higher talents gain glory

sense.def: high reputation, glorious name

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38b

tls:text.tls:line: and those with lower talents are reduced to a rage that comes from shame.

sense.def: feel embarrassed 大慚

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38b

tls:text.tls:line: and those with lower talents are reduced to a rage that comes from shame.

sense.def: fly into a rage, be prone to flying into a rage against others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38b

tls:text.tls:line: These disgruntled people will have a negative impact on their competitors' behaviour.

sense.def: cause to be flawed, cause to be full of mistakes; impair, have a negative impact on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: When men interact with each other

sense.def: interact and communicate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: they cannot always be on cheerfully friendly terms.

sense.def: regularly; invariably; in perpetuity; permanently, constantly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: when one feels angry one gets alienated.

sense.def: suffer a transient fit of uncontrollable anger, get momentarily angry and show one's hot temper at a given point of time, lose one's temper, fly into a rage

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: when one feels angry one gets alienated.

sense.def: abstract: be alienated

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: When one is alienated one feels resentment

sense.def: be full of resentment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:12; Zheng 1999: 209; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and then people will have a negative impact on one's conduct.

sense.def: cause to be flawed, cause to be full of mistakes; impair, have a negative impact on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: Since offices are few, and candidates many,

sense.def: be few in number; be few things

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: Since offices are few, and candidates many,

sense.def: be many, be numerous; contain many members; be in the majority 甚眾

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: officials will compete for promotion

sense.def: public employee of any rank; often specifically: public official of lower rank

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: officials will compete for promotion

sense.def: fight for; compete for; sometimes specifically: compete for the allegiance of (the people or a country)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: officials will compete for promotion

sense.def: promotion

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: When they meet high level officials they will malign each other

sense.def: leader; high level official

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: When they meet high level officials they will malign each other

sense.def: vilify, speak ill of without good reason; also privately: vilify, calumniate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and they will pile lies upon lies.

sense.def: put on, add on, affix; rub on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: These high level officials have no clear insight into things

sense.def: be benighted, utterly ill-informed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and so they accept such maligning pronouncements.

sense.def: declare to be acceptable, accept as correct

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and so they accept such maligning pronouncements.

sense.def: receive with approval; accept (views)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: Leaders and executive officials have different propensities,

sense.def: differ from each other as to (e.g. customs etc) see also 異乎

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: Leaders and executive officials have different propensities,

sense.def: predilection; likes (versus dislikes); preferences

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: pure and impure officials have different forms of behaviour.

sense.def: the impeccable, the morally pure, the immaculate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: pure and impure officials have different forms of behaviour.

sense.def: differ with respect to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: pure and impure officials have different forms of behaviour.

sense.def: conduct, way of behaviour as something deliberately cultivated

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: The morally immaculate officials pile on their elegant declarations

sense.def: impeccable, immaculate, morally pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: The morally immaculate officials pile on their elegant declarations

sense.def: supremely elegant

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: The morally immaculate officials pile on their elegant declarations

sense.def: what has been said

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and give their pure words.

sense.def: bring up, mention

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and give their pure words.

sense.def: all purified and cleansed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: The morally impure officials harbour rancours,

sense.def: morally defiled, morally impure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: The morally impure officials harbour rancours,

sense.def: feel in one's heart, harbour (feelings etc) 漢武帝 《悼李夫人賦》："慘鬱鬱其蕪穢兮，隱處幽而懷傷。" 晉 傅咸 《斑鳩賦》："慨感物以哀鳴，聲楚切以懷傷。" Xi Kang: 懷恥 also later 懷羞,

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: The morally impure officials harbour rancours,

sense.def: all sorts of rancour; all kinds of angry resentment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: The morally impure officials harbour rancours,

sense.def: the feeling of anger

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and by degrees try to find the fault with their rivals,

sense.def: slowly, softly, gently; with slow emphasis; at one's own pace, gradually

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and by degrees try to find the fault with their rivals,

sense.def: aspire to get to or be in the presence of or know the whereabouts of (a longed-for object, typically a person); seek to realise (aspirations etc);

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and on the basis of the slightest slander

sense.def: very tenuous, very slight

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 11; tr. Forke 2.38

tls:text.tls:line: and on the basis of the slightest slander

sense.def: popular slander, unjustified popular criticism

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: A leader may have a predilection for the person of an aide.

sense.def: show special favour; bestow special favours on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: A leader may have a predilection for the person of an aide.

sense.def: minor official

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: and believed their words .

sense.def: accept and believe

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: Then even if that aide does not show pure conduct

sense.def: impeccable, immaculate, morally pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: they are bound to be promoted skipping the ranks.

sense.def: raise to a higher level in the bureaucratic hierarchy

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: On the contrary when someone does not fit their ideals

sense.def: go against

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: Pure and straightforward officials,

sense.def: perfectly right-minded

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: if they act obstreporously and strain to realise their aspirations,

sense.def: resiliently, with noble determination

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: then they will be hated,

sense.def: eventually; and so in the end, and in the event; and then, thereupon, subsequently; eventually, in the event

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:22; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 2.39

tls:text.tls:line: then they will be hated,

sense.def: be detested

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:23; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Now even before they advance in office

sense.def: rise in rank; make progress in one's career of any kind

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:23; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: they personally suffer these three disastrous entanglements;

sense.def: be exposed to, be on the receiving end of; receive; suffer, undergo

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:23; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and having gained official appointment

sense.def: be employed, get employed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:23; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: they personally suffer these disasters.

sense.def: to put up with, to face; be exposed to (difficulties etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:23; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 21; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Even Confucius and Mòzǐ were unable to escape from this,

sense.def: cause (oneself) to avoid trouble/escape trouble

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: When one has taken the initiative for a hundred actions

sense.def: take the initiative for

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: When one has taken the initiative for a hundred actions

sense.def: deed; effort; achievement (refers to the result of acting in proper way)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and did in thousand things,

sense.def: engage in, perform, carry out; perpetrate; act according to 作亂 "start a rebellion"; 作孽 "do evil"; have the function of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: envious persons

sense.def: envious; characterised by envy

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: would rise around them like clouds.

sense.def: then subsequently

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: would rise around them like clouds.

sense.def: in massive numbers like clouds; floating about like clouds

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns and prickles would prick them and stick to their bodies and faces.

sense.def: trifoliate orange (thorny????)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns and prickles would prick them and stick to their bodies and faces.

sense.def: brambles

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns and prickles would prick them and stick to their bodies and faces.

sense.def: thorn

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns and prickles would prick them and stick to their bodies and faces.

sense.def: with a hook; with its sharp points and hooks

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns and prickles would prick them and stick to their bodies and faces.

sense.def: face, especially overall shape of face

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns and prickles would prick them and stick to their bodies and faces.

sense.def: prick (as a thorn pricking a person)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Thorns and prickles would prick them and stick to their bodies and faces.

sense.def: limb, limbs; body as constituted by its parts

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Creatures like bees and scorpions

sense.def: wasp; bee

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Creatures like bees and scorpions

sense.def: scorpion SHI

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Creatures like bees and scorpions

sense.def: kind of animal; kind of creature one is (also of humans)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: will nibble at and sting men of decent behaviour.

sense.def: pick faults with, "nibble at", attack

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:11; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 12; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: There certainly are not only six of these disasters.

sense.def: only (deverbal?)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 夫不原士之操行有三累，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Now if one does not investigate how freeman suffer three disastrous entanglements as a result of their conduct

sense.def: investigate to the bottom, investigate systematically; determine through investigation

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: then one will call those who go unscathed they will call undefiled

sense.def: go unscathed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: then one will call those who go unscathed they will call undefiled

sense.def: morally impeccable, unimpeachable

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and those who have been calumniated they will call dishonoured;

sense.def: (be exposed to>) marker of passivisation

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and those who have been calumniated they will call dishonoured;

sense.def: get slandered

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and those who have been calumniated they will call dishonoured;

sense.def: be humiliated

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Those who advance in their career they will call excellent,

sense.def: per office

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Those who advance in their career they will call excellent,

sense.def: be impressive, be excellent; be the best; be good 甚善

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are dismissed from office they will call bad.

sense.def: in rank

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: that is just a matter of good luck;

sense.def: 甚幸(of things) be a matter of good luck; be a a matter of pure luck; (of persons) have a stroke of good luck

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: but they go ahead and praise him;

sense.def: praise; refer to with reverence; recommend as the most suitable

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: If one takes these kinds of attitudes

sense.def: the attitude one takes

tls:text.tls:srcline: 論者既不知累害所從生，又不知被累害者行賢潔也，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 210; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and they do not understand that those who suffer these disastrous entanglements and disasters may show talented and pure behaviour.

sense.def: of persons: be (the more) worthy; be distinguished; be morally distinguished, be a worthy, be talented; be excellent (sometimes also of actions) 甚賢，最賢

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: If one strikes with clay at mud

sense.def: clay; plaster

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: or one speckles black silk with black,

sense.def: what is black> black things

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: or one speckles black silk with black,

sense.def: make a black spot on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: or one speckles black silk with black,

sense.def: silk fabric (often used in conjunction with bó 帛 in LJ)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Purity seems to be exposed to dust

sense.def: something pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: Purity seems to be exposed to dust

sense.def: dust; sand; (also abstractly in a transferred sense: defilement)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: whiteness takes in dirt.

sense.def: what is white; the contextually determinate white thing

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: whiteness takes in dirt.

sense.def: be exposed to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: whiteness takes in dirt.

sense.def: dirt, dust

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: What the giant flies will sully

sense.def: Chinese giant black fly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: What the giant flies will sully

sense.def: be made dirty

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: is always the white silk.

sense.def: refined, boiled silk, off-white silk that has undergone refining processes

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: One who is standing on a highest is in danger,

sense.def: mountain top

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: One who is standing on a highest is in danger,

sense.def: be in a precarious state; be fraught with danger, be doomed to imminent disaster; be endangered; to risk danger

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and those living in prosperity suffer losses.

sense.def: be abundant; be strong and resourceful

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: and those living in prosperity suffer losses.

sense.def: get weakened

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:24; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 39b

tls:text.tls:line: The kinds of things that have fallen down ,

sense.def: be in a suspended position

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Qū Píng was a man of purity,

sense.def: maintain purity
