tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Qū Píng was a man of purity,

sense.def: morally impeccable, unimpeachable

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Qū Píng was a man of purity,

sense.def: be morally undefiled and pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: but all the dogs in the country barked at him.

sense.def: semi-urbanised or urbanised settlement; city; town which serves as an administrative centre

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: but all the dogs in the country barked at him.

sense.def: dog

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: but all the dogs in the country barked at him.

sense.def: all of them as a flock; all

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: but all the dogs in the country barked at him.

sense.def: bark at the object clear from the context

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Dogs barked at what appeas strange to them.

sense.def: bark at

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Dogs barked at what appeas strange to them.

sense.def: be surprised at, be amazed at

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Criticising remarkable men and being suspicious of heroes

sense.def: declare wrong> criticise; disagree with, deny; disapprove, be opposed to; oppose

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Criticising remarkable men and being suspicious of heroes

sense.def: HUAINAN: hero of the second order; hero

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Criticising remarkable men and being suspicious of heroes

sense.def: be suspicious of; distrust; hold in suspicion

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Criticising remarkable men and being suspicious of heroes

sense.def: HUAINAN: hero of the lowest order; hero

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: A remarkable person is held responsible because of his extraordinary ability

sense.def: tremendous; extraordinary

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: A remarkable person is held responsible because of his extraordinary ability

sense.def: hero

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: will attract the sound of the barking pack of dogs.

sense.def: summon so as to cause to come> attract

tls:text.tls:srcline: 豈宜更勉奴下，循不肖哉？

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: why should one go on to encourage slaves to follow incompetent people (with attitudes like that)?

sense.def: encourage

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: are not the men who should be encouraged.

sense.def: encourage

tls:text.tls:srcline: 豈宜更偶俗全身以弭謗哉？

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:12; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:13; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Should then one adapt to the world and to keep one's person hale and whole in order to avoid slander?

sense.def: popular slander, unjustified popular criticism

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Those who match with the vulgar crowd and keep their persons hale and whole

sense.def: conform to, adapt to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Those who match with the vulgar crowd and keep their persons hale and whole

sense.def: (cause to be safe>) keep safe and unharmed, safeguard so as to keep intact

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: are hypocrites.

sense.def: hypocrites 鄉愿

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Those hypocrites

sense.def: hypocritical

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: affect impeccable, flawless behaviour

sense.def: discreet circumlocution: imperfection (i.e. mistake)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and there is nothing one can blame them for

sense.def: declare wrong> criticise; disagree with, deny; disapprove, be opposed to; oppose

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: there is nothing one might attack them sharply for.

sense.def: fig: criticise; reprimand

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: But those were at the same time the men who were blamed by Confucius

sense.def: be criticised by

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and condemned by Mencius.

sense.def: be blamed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Those who excelled through talent and attractiveness in ancient time,

sense.def: achieve ultimate perfection

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: could not safeguard themselves.

sense.def: guard, protect ZUO 衛其足ZHUANG 衛生

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: were in actual fact the talented and morally pure people.

sense.def: immaculate and morally pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: By carrying the slander which leads to diastrous calamities to extremes

sense.def: popular slander, unjustified popular criticism

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: the truth about their talent and moral purity became manifest.

sense.def: moral distinction; moral worthiness; talent; moral excellence, moral talent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: the truth about their talent and moral purity became manifest.

sense.def: moral purity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: the truth about their talent and moral purity became manifest.

sense.def: truth, facts

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:25; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 24; Hunan 1997: 13; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: the truth about their talent and moral purity became manifest.

sense.def: become visible, appear, come to light; show one's face

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: If one has established manifest evidence of one's talent and moral purity

sense.def: immaculate and morally pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: If one has established manifest evidence of one's talent and moral purity

sense.def: manifest visible proof

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: how can there fail to arise the defilement of slander?

sense.def: slander

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: how can there fail to arise the defilement of slander?

sense.def: dust; sand; (also abstractly in a transferred sense: defilement)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: The players wish they could break the fingers of Bó Yá,

sense.def: string musician

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: The players wish they could break the fingers of Bó Yá,

sense.def: yearn to; think intensely of V-ing; be all concerned to V

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: The players wish they could break the fingers of Bó Yá,

sense.def: break off; take off (an ear); have (one's ribs etc) broken

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: The players wish they could break the fingers of Bó Yá,

sense.def: finger

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and the charioteers wish they could have crushed the hands of Wáng Liáng.

sense.def: hope that; wish one could; wish one could have; aspire to; would like to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and the charioteers wish they could have crushed the hands of Wáng Liáng.

sense.def: break off

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and the charioteers wish they could have crushed the hands of Wáng Liáng.

sense.def: arm including hand

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Because they were all craving for the fame of exceptional skill ,

sense.def: monopolise, keep a monopoly for, control to the exclusion of others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Because they were all craving for the fame of exceptional skill ,

sense.def: supreme competence

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and resented that other were better than they.

sense.def: hate it that, hate it when

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and resented that other were better than they.

sense.def: overcome, win against; compete successfully with; be superior to; overpower

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and resented that other were better than they.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the girl of Wèi was a great beauty,

sense.def: unmarried woman; girl

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: Thus the girl of Wèi was a great beauty,

sense.def: sexy, sexually attractive

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:13; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 211; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: but Wú Jì expelled him.

sense.def: chase away, drive away; banish from one's presence; oust (a ruler etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: If someone has an ingratiating appearance he will increasinly arouse envy

sense.def: person who always strikes ingratiating poses, a flatterer ???

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: If someone has an ingratiating appearance he will increasinly arouse envy

sense.def: even more than before; the more... the more; ever more

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: and a sycophantic person will call up many glib-toungued people around him.

sense.def: colloquialism: sycophant ???

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: and a sycophantic person will call up many glib-toungued people around him.

sense.def: flatterer; the psychophantic 四佞

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, one does not sprinkle dust in wet halls,

sense.def: moist; humid

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, one does not sprinkle dust in wet halls,

sense.def: sprinkle in order to make wet

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: and for a humble cottage one does not build an (elaborate) wind-breaker.

sense.def: lowly, humble, of low status, menial; have a low status

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: and for a humble cottage one does not build an (elaborate) wind-breaker.

sense.def: block off (e.g. the wind)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: Plants shaken by the wind cannot be made to grop properly,

sense.def: be pushed over

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: and banks against which the water dashes to do get to be craggy and sharp.

sense.def: be steep, high, and dangerous (of mountains or city walls)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: and the drowning oneself in the Yangtse, and the jumping into the Yellow River may also be understood.

sense.def: jump into in order to drown oneself in

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41b

tls:text.tls:line: and the drowning oneself in the Yangtse, and the jumping into the Yellow River may also be understood.

sense.def: drown oneself in

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: If someone uses surpassing talent in order to curry favour with the vulgar crowd,

sense.def: surpassing, oustanding

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: If someone uses surpassing talent in order to curry favour with the vulgar crowd,

sense.def: (manage to) please through an affable appearance, curry favour with; beguile

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: and if one strives to safeguard on's reputation for efficiency in the eyes of the leader,

sense.def: leader; high level official

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: and one then does not meet with the disaster that befell Dèng Xì ,

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: and does not bring upon oneself the punishment that befell Zǐ Xù,

sense.def: suffer because of one's own fault, bring upon oneself; be held responsible

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 26; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: then one has been really lucky.

sense.def: 甚幸(of things) be a matter of good luck; be a a matter of pure luck; (of persons) have a stroke of good luck

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: People did not assault the dead body of Mèng Bēn,

sense.def: corpse 屍 is a variant character created to refer unambiguously to the corpse rather than the impersonator of the dead

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: People did not assault the dead body of Mèng Bēn,

sense.def: kill with a sword; try to kill with a sword

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: nor do they throw water on a hundred bushels of burnt out embers,

sense.def: dead and cold (ashes)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: nor do they throw water on a hundred bushels of burnt out embers,

sense.def: one hundred bushels: measure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: nor do they throw water on a hundred bushels of burnt out embers,

sense.def: irrigate; sprinkle over (hands etc); pour water on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: because the glow of the fire is extinguished.

sense.def: glow of fire

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: because the glow of the fire is extinguished.

sense.def: be destroyed, be reduced to nothing

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: or if dedicating oneself to higher aspirations one is arrogant to one's peers,

sense.def: deploy vigorously

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: or if dedicating oneself to higher aspirations one is arrogant to one's peers,

sense.def: group; faction, gang

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: then one will certainly always be slandered or envied by educated people.

sense.def: knowledgeable, of broad learning; educated

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: then one will certainly always be slandered or envied by educated people.

sense.def: be jealous of (erotically or politically) 妒功 妒而惡之

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida 1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41

tls:text.tls:line: For one's right-mindedness one incurs disastrous entanglements due to the vulgar crowd.

sense.def: right-minded

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida 1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41

tls:text.tls:line: Perhaps it was this that Confucius was worried about

sense.def: be worried

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida 1979:27; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 27; Hunan 1997: 14; tr. Forke 2.41

tls:text.tls:line: and what Mencius was full of sorrow about.

sense.def: sad and dejected

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: Those possessed of great virtue attract calumnies ,

sense.def: be immense

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: Those possessed of great virtue attract calumnies ,

sense.def: wave to come, attract to one's presence; summon

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: Those possessed of great virtue attract calumnies ,

sense.def: popular slander, unjustified popular criticism

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are (mere) freemen will indulge in dirty rhetoric (against them).

sense.def: be full of talk; talk too much

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: The defamation of Zāng Cāng

sense.def: vilification; direct criticism, open public criticism to the face; vituperation

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:14; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 212; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 41b

tls:text.tls:line: has not yet died out,

sense.def: cease; be cut short

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: if the king of Wèi mistaking that there is tiger in the city,

sense.def: mistake, misapprehension

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and the mother of Zēng Zǐ throwing away the shuttle,

sense.def: mistake, act of carelessness

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: then jade changing into stone,

sense.def: change from one's original form to become, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and a pearl changing into a shingle,

sense.def: pearl, bead

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and a pearl changing into a shingle,

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993: 29; Hunan 1997: 15; tr. Forke 40b

tls:text.tls:line: and a pearl changing into a shingle,

sense.def: pebble

tls:text.tls:srcline: 昧心冥冥之知使之然也。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: The limited understanding of a completely obfuscated mind brings this about.

sense.def: benighted

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: What King Wén considered as mere dung and soil,

sense.def: consider the contextually determinate object as V; consider that the contextually determinate object Vs THESE EXAMPLES ARE IN A TERRIBLE MESS. MUST BE CHECKED.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: What King Wén considered as mere dung and soil,

sense.def: dust and dung; dung and mud

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: It was not that Zhòu hated sageliness and was fond of wickedness.

sense.def: detest; harbour strong dislike

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: It was not that Zhòu hated sageliness and was fond of wickedness.

sense.def: quality of a sage, sageliness

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: It was not that Zhòu hated sageliness and was fond of wickedness.

sense.def: wickedness as a psychological feature 其惡最甚

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: His intellect was confused and beclouded.

sense.def: be completely confused

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: If one is confused and beclouded and unable to get clear about things,

sense.def: understand the contextually determinate things properly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: then even Wēizǐ leaving his office ten times

sense.def: leave, go away; leave the scene

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: or Bǐ Gān cutting himself five times.

sense.def: be split

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:15; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:14; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: would not be something to be really worried about.

sense.def: be worried

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Thus when the three "Overseers" (younger brothers appointed by the Duke of Zhōu) slandered the sage,

sense.def: make private extremely negative remarks about someone behind his back

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: he fled to Chǔ.

sense.def: flee to (a place, typically another state)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: When the stepmother maligned the filial son

sense.def: vilify, speak ill of without good reason; also privately: vilify, calumniate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: When the stepmother maligned the filial son

sense.def: characterised by filial love (see VIRTUE)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: At that time, during the period of the Zhōu, who was not confused?

sense.def: be misguided, deluded, confused

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Those who sang about these things

sense.def: recite by heart; recite for others to hear

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Those who sang about these things

sense.def: recite and chant (poetry)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Those who sang about these things

sense.def: intone (poetry, sounds, tunes) with deep, often with drawn-out, emotion

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:16; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: were saddened by the events.

sense.def: be saddened by, feel sad about

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: If there had not been the sudden onset of a thunderstorm

sense.def: thunderstorm

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: If there had not been the sudden onset of a thunderstorm

sense.def: change (typically from a norm); sudden unusual development

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: If during the summer there had not fallen frost

sense.def: when it came to, at (such-and-such a time); during

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: If during the summer there had not fallen frost

sense.def: ZUO Xi 16: fall from the sky (stones!); to rain down; to fall (like rain)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: If during the summer there had not fallen frost

sense.def: frozen dew or vapour, frost

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Virtuous behaviour cannot move Heaven

sense.def: cultivation of decency; cultivation of virtue or inner power, of an inner authority

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Virtuous behaviour cannot move Heaven

sense.def: affect psychologically, move; of things and humans

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and earnestness cannot bring about effective change.

sense.def: earnestness of attitude

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and earnestness cannot bring about effective change.

sense.def: effect a change on, have a considerable impact on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: If the superior man maintains solid good faith and trustiness

sense.def: be stolid and faithful

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: this is a way of paying very careful attention to oneself.

sense.def: investigate (oneself) carefully

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: this is a way of paying very careful attention to oneself.

sense.def: have a detailed and discriminating understanding of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: this is a way of paying very careful attention to oneself.

sense.def: reflexive and contrastive (or sometimes at least emphatic)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: but how can he stop disasters hitting others?

sense.def: put a stop to, repress

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 213; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: but how can he stop disasters hitting others?

sense.def: any kind of harm, any kind of damage

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: The sages do not work for their fame,

sense.def: sages and worthies; very distinguished men

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: The sages do not work for their fame,

sense.def: work on, deal with, handle properly, carry out properly; LH 2 work for, work at

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: They have their dark shortcomings focussed on in public,

sense.def: shortcoming, weakness, weak points

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and they have their gleaming excellent points hidden from public view.

sense.def: keep hidden; hide away from public sight (also abstract things such as shortcomings)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and they have their gleaming excellent points hidden from public view.

sense.def: the superior of the kind; the relatively superior thing; the superior aspects; strong points

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: They do not care about the injustices they personally suffer,

sense.def: take into serious consideration, be mainly concerned

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: They do not care about the injustices they personally suffer,

sense.def: unjust accusation

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and they do not put a stop to public rumours.

sense.def: put an end to; stop; reduce radically

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and they do not put a stop to public rumours.

sense.def: rumours, gossip

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: They get sullied and they get slandered,

sense.def: dirty talk behind one's back (See also DUST fig) cf. gòu 詬

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: They get sullied and they get slandered,

sense.def: bring upon oneself Nab-ing; marker of passivisation, specifically self-inflicted suffering of an impact.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:15; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and they do not seek to be known as pure and perfect.

sense.def: be accomplished, be without flaws or shortcomings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Wicked and dishonest people

sense.def: wicked; uncorrect; heterodox, heretical

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Wicked and dishonest people

sense.def: wickedly dishonest

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Wicked and dishonest people

sense.def: dishonest, dissimulating

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: order their persons in order to skillfully adapt to vulgar taste,

sense.def: conform craftily to, use all one's skill in conforming to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: they thus cultivate fraudulence in order to meet the expectations of the vulgar crowd.

sense.def: cultivate (one's person, the ancients etc); apply oneself to; train and exercise (troops); occasionally also with negative objects: LH 2 修詐 "cultivate fraudulence"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: they thus cultivate fraudulence in order to meet the expectations of the vulgar crowd.

sense.def: deceitfulness; fraudulence, deceit; acts of deceit

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: they thus cultivate fraudulence in order to meet the expectations of the vulgar crowd.

sense.def: conform to, adapt to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: It is like a craftsman lacquering washing basins,

sense.def: to laquer

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: It is like a craftsman lacquering washing basins,

sense.def: vessel for holding water (sometimes decorated with lacquer)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: so that the perforation of side-walls of the basin becomes invisible;

sense.def: tattered, or full of holes

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: or like an artist wielding with great skill balls or swords,

sense.def: handle with great skill, manipulate expertly; play with

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: or like an artist wielding with great skill balls or swords,

sense.def: pellet; ball 丸二

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: or like an artist wielding with great skill balls or swords,

sense.def: sword

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: or like an artist wielding with great skill balls or swords,

sense.def: professional entertainer specialising in song

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot be sure what his hands and fingers are like.

sense.def: hand; hands; fist

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot be sure what his hands and fingers are like.

sense.def: finger

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: The contemporaries do not notice the shortcomings

sense.def: shortcoming, weakness, weak points

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and so they all praise such people;

sense.def: all the subjects; the whole lot of the subjects at the same time

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:30; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:29; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and so they all praise such people;

sense.def: praise; refer to with reverence; recommend as the most suitable

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:31; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:30; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: what our contemporaries call men of moral talent and purity

sense.def: all sorts of moral and professional excellence

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:31; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:30; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: what they call wicked and morally defiled people

sense.def: be wicked and morally defiled

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:31; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:30; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: some actions lead to public shame,

sense.def: summon officially; summon in; call in; deliver a summons (on behalf of a ruler), call in (on behalf of someone else); occasionally with abstract objects 召恥

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:31; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:30; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Where this applies it typically has its origins in minor people."

sense.def: petty people

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:31; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:30; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: he is born with wickedness

sense.def: hold in one's mouth> encompass; have within one, contain

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:31; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:30; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: he is born with wickedness

sense.def: deviation; impropriety; wickedness

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:17; Beida1979:31; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 214; Guizhou 1993:30; Hunan1997:16; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: he is (as it were) bathed in disasters,

sense.def: bathe

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Thus creatures who live in fire do not get harmed by dry heat;

sense.def: in the fire [fire-like; (cooked) with fire]; with fire

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Thus creatures who live in fire do not get harmed by dry heat;

sense.def: find distressing

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: creatures who live in the water do not suffer disasters of drowning.

sense.def: on water 水行travel by river/water

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: creatures who live in the water do not suffer disasters of drowning.

sense.def: drowning

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Fire does not find heat objectionable,

sense.def: find bitterness in

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Fire does not find heat objectionable,

sense.def: warm weather; HF 8.8.48: (the onset of) warm and pleasant weather; heat

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: water does not find cold painful to bear.

sense.def: feel pain at the fact that S

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: The nature of their essential energies being such,

sense.def: be so of and by itself; be naturally oneself; be natural; come naturally

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: As for a superior man

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: he will attract disaster through his earnestly loyal proposals,

sense.def: devoted, trusty (of persons and of actions); doing his best

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and through his morally elevated behaviour he will attract public shame.

sense.def: elevated and noble (behaviour, office, writings)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and through his morally elevated behaviour he will attract public shame.

sense.def: public humiliation, public disgrace; shameful episode

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: And thus as for an overwhelming evil as large as Mount Tài,

sense.def: huge big 泰山之惡

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: The slightest kind of goodness

sense.def: tiny little

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: a petty man will be unable to aquire.

sense.def: petty person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: From the point of view of defects and pollution

sense.def: filth; dirtiness

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: what is pure may may be made impure with dust, and what is white may be sullied with dirt.

sense.def: something pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: what is pure may may be made impure with dust, and what is white may be sullied with dirt.

sense.def: what is white; the contextually determinate white thing

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: what is pure may may be made impure with dust, and what is white may be sullied with dirt.

sense.def: dirt, dust

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: From the point of view of slander

sense.def: slander

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: the decent people are objects of envy,

sense.def: those who are decent and good

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: the decent people are objects of envy,

sense.def: be exposed to jealousy 見妒

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and the especially distinguished are loudly insulted.

sense.def: unique person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and the especially distinguished are loudly insulted.

sense.def: those who are singularly elevated and distinguished

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and the especially distinguished are loudly insulted.

sense.def: be yelled at

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and elevated behaviour willlead to public shame.

sense.def: public disgrace, opprobium 雪恥 "wash away a public disgrace"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: even gems will have flaws, and even pearls will have faulty places.

sense.def: reddish pattern in jade; flaw (in jade, occasonally also in the image of the sun etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: even gems will have flaws, and even pearls will have faulty places.

sense.def: pearl, bead

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: even gems will have flaws, and even pearls will have faulty places.

sense.def: flaw (in pearls and jade etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: was renowned over all Yǎn Zhōu.

sense.def: be praised

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: His conduct was impeccable and his public record was without blemish,

sense.def: be accomplished, be without flaws or shortcomings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: His conduct was impeccable and his public record was without blemish,

sense.def: behaviour in the past; record of actions in the past

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: His conduct was impeccable and his public record was without blemish,

sense.def: be unsullied, without blemish; clean

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and he had not the slightest fault.

sense.def: (not have) the slightest (NP)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and he had not the slightest fault.

sense.def: flaw (in pearls and jade etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: When the time of entering the administration had come,

sense.def: should appropriately; be due to, be supposed to; be bound to; must; HANSHU 65: ought to (be caned); deserve to; shouldNOTE THAT MANY OF THESE ATTRIBUTIONS HAVE TO BE MOVED TO vt[0]+V[0]

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: (Before he had advanced to fill office he suffered three disastrous entanglements,)

sense.def: be exposed to, be on the receiving end of; receive; suffer, undergo

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: and after he was employed he suffered three disasters.

sense.def: to put up with, to face; be exposed to (difficulties etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Even a Confucius or a Mòzǐ would not have been able to save himself,

sense.def: cause (oneself) to avoid trouble/escape trouble

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: It was because when everbody praises someone as morally pure

sense.def: declare to be morally pure

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: that is not because he is really morally worthy.

sense.def: (is) truly

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: (human) precious gems and ordinary pebbles are intermixed.

sense.def: be intermixed, be indistinguishable

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: (human) precious gems and ordinary pebbles are intermixed.

sense.def: be intermixed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: the excellent and the bad cause each other to flourish.

sense.def: make grow in clusters

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 2; Liu 1990:18; Beida1979:34; Yang 1999:15; Zheng 1999: 215; Guizhou 1993:33; Hunan1997:17; tr. Forke 2: 41

tls:text.tls:line: Now those who pick out gems ruin stones and pick out the gems,

sense.def: pick out (the right person)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: In general someone's meeting the right person as well as his meeting with [getting tied-up in/with CH] disasters

sense.def: mate of any sex; right opposite number, right person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: In general someone's meeting the right person as well as his meeting with [getting tied-up in/with CH] disasters

sense.def: any kind of harm, any kind of damage

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: all depend upon destiny.

sense.def: be because of, follow as a result of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: all depend upon destiny.

sense.def: fate, destiny

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: From the kings and dukes down to ordinary people

sense.def: until; down to (such and such a person)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: everyone with a head and with eyes ,

sense.def: Han usage: LH: all (NPs); also: any, as in He Yan on LY 1.2: 上謂凡在己上者

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: everyone with a head and with eyes ,

sense.def: natural kind, kind, class

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: every creature that has blood in its veins,

sense.def: hold in one's mouth> encompass; have within one, contain

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:19; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: every creature that has blood in its veins,

sense.def: what belongs to a certain category; the likes of 有血氣之屬

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: he will still get involved in disastrous misfortunes.

sense.def: disastrous misfortunes of any kind

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: but he will still meet with excellent good fortune

sense.def: meet (the right object); be exposed to (the right person, times, etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: but he will still meet with excellent good fortune

sense.def: excellent fortune of any kind

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:18; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: and whoever is destined for a humble position

sense.def: be fated to V; have the destiny to come to V

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: Thus when it comes to being rich or noble it is as if there are spirits helping this to come about;

sense.def: it is as if S

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: Thus when it comes to being rich or noble it is as if there are spirits helping this to come about;

sense.def: offer help to the contextually determinate person(s)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: and when it comes to being being poor or of low status it is af if ghosts send disaster.

sense.def: bring down disaster on them

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: People who are destined to become noble

sense.def: be fated to V; have the destiny to come to V

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: People who are destined to become noble

sense.def: rise in status, become more noble; try to become mor noble

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: try to learn like along with all the others but are alone in achieving success.

sense.def: jointly, en groupe; together with all others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: try to learn like along with all the others but are alone in achieving success.

sense.def: devote oneself to study; be devoted to study; engage in intellectual work; work to improve oneself morally/intellectually

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: try to learn like along with all the others but are alone in achieving success.

sense.def: (positive:) all on one's own, independently, relying on oneself only; under four eyes

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: try to learn like along with all the others but are alone in achieving success.

sense.def: succeed, win through; reach one's destination

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 217; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: together with others they enter official employment, but they are alone in gaining advancement.

sense.def: be promoted

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 218; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: (On the other hand ) one with scanty knowledge and small virtue,

sense.def: be small in quantity; be small in range; be slight

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 218; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 144

tls:text.tls:line: (On the other hand ) one with scanty knowledge and small virtue,

sense.def: be weak, insufficient

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 218; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 145

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the wisdom or dullness in dealing with things,

sense.def: deal with administratively; deal with effectively; come to be in effective control of, dominate; take spiritual charge of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 218; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 145

tls:text.tls:line: and the purity or impurity of conduct,

sense.def: relative purity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:20; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 218; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 145

tls:text.tls:line: how then would poverty and meaness, disasters and dangerous come in ?

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:21; Beida1979:38; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 218; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:19; tr. Forke 1: 145

tls:text.tls:line: and has wise but no chance to practise it,

sense.def: wisdom; BUDDH: perfect insight, wisdom skr. prajñā

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:21; Beida1979:41; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 218; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:20; tr. Forke 1: 145

tls:text.tls:line: "They are so virtuous and wise ,

sense.def: 養民如子 like (comparison being with the V-ing of N2, the object of the preceding transitive verb with the V-ing of N1)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3 Liu 1990:21; Beida1979:41; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 219; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:20; tr. Forke 1: 146

tls:text.tls:line: People may display the same wisdom in looking after their livelihood.

sense.def: state of being alive; life; survival; sometimes even: livelihood 治生 "look after one's livelihood"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3 Liu 1990:21; Beida1979:41; Yang 1999:20; Zheng 1999: 219; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:20; tr. Forke 1: 146

tls:text.tls:line: and one's wisedom can neither thrive nor perish.

sense.def: be abundant; be strong and resourceful

tls:text.tls:line: undertake something at a lucky and propitious time, and happiness arrives,

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:22; Beida1979:44; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 220; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:22; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: He went to the imperial palace and presented a memorial,

sense.def: gate tower; lookout tower by the gate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:44; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 220; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:22; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: The scholars comment upon one classic,

sense.def: scholars; sometimes, especially when used in opposition to 墨者: Confucians

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:44; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 220; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:22; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: The scholars comment upon one classic,

sense.def: classic book; main textBUDDH: Buddhist scripture, often concretely referring to sūtras which traditionally were regarded as the words of Buddha

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:44; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 220; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:22; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: in which they have become well versed in the capital,

sense.def: capital

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:44; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 220; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:22; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: who passed the first and the second examinations at the first trial,

sense.def: examination

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:44; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 220; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:22; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: And such eloquence as Fàn Jū sought advantage from king Zhào of Qín, 5

sense.def: seek the aquaintance of, seek to meet

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius was a sage,

sense.def: be a sage (not: be THE sage) (tensed)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: and Mèng Zǐ, a worthy,

sense.def: be a worthy, be a person of moral talent; also plural: be persons of moral worth, be worthies

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:23; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:21; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 147

tls:text.tls:line: and did not confound truth or untruth.

sense.def: rightness or otherwise, appropriateness or otherwise; right and wrong

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:24; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: How could the right time be known?"

sense.def: get an idea of, get any idea of; get wind of, notice

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:24; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: The empress Lǔ sent for a good doctor.

sense.def: medically specialised shaman; medical doctor8

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:24; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: The doctor said :

sense.def: medically specialised shaman; medical doctor8

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:24; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: was that not Heaven's decree!

sense.def: commands of Heaven; fate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:24; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 221; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: Even a Biǎn Què would be no use."

sense.def: mythical doctor of antiquity, on whom there is a biography in SHIJI

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: At first the King of Dài was not heirapparent,

sense.def: this, these 此人

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: At first the King of Dài was not heirapparent,

sense.def: the right time; right moment, an opportunity 大時; the moment for something; see also 遇時 "encounter opportunities"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: and Yā Fū was not the legitimate son.

sense.def: heir

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: Because they encountered the proper time, and fell in with the chance,

sense.def: meet (the right object); be exposed to (the right person, times, etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: Because they encountered the proper time, and fell in with the chance,

sense.def: meet by coincidence; sometimes generally: get to meet, have the opportunity to meet (someone who is hard to meet, or whom it is a good fortune to get to meet); run into, be exposed to (situations)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 148

tls:text.tls:line: Because they encountered the proper time, and fell in with the chance,

sense.def: a coincidental opportunity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:46; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: one will tumble and fall.

sense.def: stumble so as to fall forward

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:47; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: can live secretly and await their time.

sense.def: in hiding, hidden away, all hidden away; in hidden confinement 幽死

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:47; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven's fate is difficult to know,

sense.def: commands of Heaven; fate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:47; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: people are unable to find it out.

sense.def: be able to (loan for 能)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:47; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: though fleeing wealth and nobility,

sense.def: escape from; avoid by running away from; run away from, abscond from (difficulties, contracts etc)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:47; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: though fleeing wealth and nobility,

sense.def: being rich, the state of being wealthy, wealth

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:25; Beida1979:47; Yang 1999:22; Zheng 1999: 222; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:23; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: though fleeing wealth and nobility,

sense.def: flee from; stay clear of; keep away from, get out of the way of, keep out of the way of; ZZ 37: (decide to) keep away from (high and low places); flinch before (an enemy); bypass and fail to consider (a candidate);

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: People exert themselves and do their utmost to acquire wealth,

sense.def: make an effort; make every effort

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: he imagine what he wants must come of itself.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: it can be completed without any work,

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: and it arrives spontaneously without walking.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 149

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are to have high status get fine talents and wisdom spontaneously.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: the wealth arrives spontaneously.

sense.def: arrive, occur

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: The happiness of wealth and nobility ,

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: Those who believe in fate say:

sense.def: the principles of fate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: "If one knows one will be lucky,
