sense.def: be in good luck; turn out lucky

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: If the heavenly fate is particularly lucky,

sense.def: (Heaven-sent) auspicious events or good fortune

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: If the heavenly fate is particularly lucky,

sense.def: serious; substantial; considerable in extent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: whereas if the heavenly fate is much unlucky,

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: and ascended the throne by force. (P.26)

sense.def: establish oneself as

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: If by heaven's fate it had to be so.7

sense.def: by the fate of Heaven

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 3; Liu 1990:26; Beida1979:50; Yang 1999:23; Zheng 1999: 223; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:25; tr. Forke 1: 150

tls:text.tls:line: though fleeing and running away from it,

sense.def: flee from; try to avoid, try to get away from

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: means war, fire, crushing and drowing.

sense.def: the act of setting fire to something

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: refers to the copiousness and scarcity of the vital energy which one receives 4.

sense.def: be abundant (of liquids and gaseous substances; often used figuratively)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 兵燒壓溺，遭以所稟為命，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: War and fire, crushing and drowing fall in with the fate which one has received ,

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 兵燒壓溺，遭以所稟為命，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: War and fire, crushing and drowing fall in with the fate which one has received ,

sense.def: receive; receive passively

tls:text.tls:srcline: 若夫彊弱夭壽，以百為數；

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: As for the fate of strength and long life, it takes a hundred years as the normal number,

sense.def: 若夫Ｘ: as far as X is concerned

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: When one receives much vital energy, then his body becomes strong,

sense.def: be abundant (of liquids and gaseous substances; often used figuratively)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: and the body being weak, life is short.

sense.def: limb, limbs; body as constituted by its parts

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:26; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: and his life span will beshort.

sense.def: lifetime, span of life (long OR short)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:28; Beida1979:53; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:27; tr. Forke 1:313

tls:text.tls:line: If people do not meet with any accidents,

sense.def: encounter in any way

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: but the fruit withers, dies, and drops;

sense.def: of trees: wither and die

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: but the fruit withers, dies, and drops;

sense.def: wither so as to die

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: but the fruit withers, dies, and drops;

sense.def: (of walls or buildings or trees:) collapse

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: although their forms are complete,

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: When a baby is born,

sense.def: small child; sometimes: new baby; later also simply: son (of any age)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: When a baby is born,

sense.def: get born; be born

tls:text.tls:srcline: 號啼之聲鴻朗高暢者壽，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: those whose cries are shrill and piercing will live long,

sense.def: the act of crying (e.g. of a new-born baby)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 號啼之聲鴻朗高暢者壽，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: those whose cries are shrill and piercing will live long,

sense.def: generally: sound made by any creature

tls:text.tls:srcline: 號啼之聲鴻朗高暢者壽，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: those whose cries are shrill and piercing will live long,

sense.def: enjoy a long life, live out one's span; be long-lived

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: When a woman bears her child at a longer intervals, the child will be fit for life;

sense.def: a woman (married or definitely of marriagable age i.e. above 15)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: When a woman bears her child at a longer intervals, the child will be fit for life;

sense.def: at long intervals

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: When a woman bears her child at a longer intervals, the child will be fit for life;

sense.def: remain alive

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: when she nourishes a child at frequent intervals, the child will die.

sense.def: numerous times, frequently; on several occasions; at frequent intervals

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: when she nourishes a child at frequent intervals, the child will die.

sense.def: give birth to (and foster up) the contextually determinate creature

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: when she nourishes a child at frequent intervals, the child will die.

sense.def: offspring; child; also: child (i.e. daughter)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and the child will be strong;

sense.def: be very tough or strong

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314; tr. Hu Chirui, rev. CH

tls:text.tls:line: and the child will be wheakness.

sense.def: be very weak (as a baby at birth)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: The child who have been born is died, and the fondling is doomed to be ominous,

sense.def: be delivered of, give birth to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: The child who have been born is died, and the fondling is doomed to be ominous,

sense.def: be ominous, baleful, ill-omened, inauspicious

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: because her[a mother] bearing child is frequent,

sense.def: have children

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: because her[a mother] bearing child is frequent,

sense.def: give milk, feed children

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: because her[a mother] bearing child is frequent,

sense.def: often

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: Though a human body can be formed,

sense.def: human, designated for men, belonging to human beings; designed for human consumption

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:55; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:28; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: Though a human body can be formed,

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:29; Beida1979:56; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:314

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore a man is called Zhàng Fū, (P.29)

sense.def: adult male

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: There is a saying that,

sense.def: proverb; sometimes also attributed to a place 宋人語曰

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: if one aspires to a royalty and does not succeed,

sense.def: plan to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: if one aspires to a royalty and does not succeed,

sense.def: gain royal supremacy, reign supreme; become a king, get to rule as king; become a proper king

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: backing up a step he can be a leading prince.

sense.def: assert oneself as hegemon; become leader, preeminent ruler, or hegemon; come to act as leading person; become the leading state

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: Leading princes are the reduced state of royalty.

sense.def: leader; paramount leader, hegemon 五霸

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: Leading princes are the reduced state of royalty.

sense.def: get to the point of V-ing

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: one can retire to become a leading prince;

sense.def: leader; paramount leader, hegemon 五霸

tls:text.tls:srcline: 以其形體小大長短同一等也。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: and because their bodies are as big and as tall as that of others.

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:57; Yang 1999:27; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:29; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: The bodies of birds and animals are different from the bodies of men,

sense.def: birds and beasts

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: The Confucians say,

sense.def: scholars; sometimes, especially when used in opposition to 墨者: Confucians

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: During the time of universal peace,

sense.def: peace; times of universal peace; era of great peace

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:30; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:315

tls:text.tls:line: He wished to abdicate and found Shùn.

sense.def: abdicate

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:31; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:316

tls:text.tls:line: If counting all these numbers he must be over a hundred years.

sense.def: calculate; count, count in; count precisely

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:31; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:316

tls:text.tls:line: If counting all these numbers he must be over a hundred years.

sense.def: quantity; Anzahl; (magical) number e.g. 用六數 "uses the number six; use sextuplets of things".

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:31; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:316

tls:text.tls:line: King Wén was ninety-seven years old when he died,

sense.def: of senior officials: die [occasionally also used to refer to the death of an emperor]

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:33; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:316

tls:text.tls:line: therefore during the age of universal peace the number of long-lived persons was great.

sense.def: peace; times of universal peace; era of great peace

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 4; Liu 1990:33; Beida1979:58; Yang 1999:28; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:30; tr. Forke 1:316

tls:text.tls:line: are similar to men whose life either exceeds or falls short of a hundred years.

sense.def: on some occasions... on other occasions; sometimes..., at other times

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:63; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:31; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: but when they meet disaster or happiness,

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:63; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:31; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: but when they meet disaster or happiness,

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven or the ancestors); good fortune sent from above; fortunate circumstances

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:63; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:31; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: but when they meet disaster or happiness,

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:63; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:31; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: but some of them are rewarded, some punished.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:63; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:31; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: but some are trusted, some are suspected.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:63; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:31; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are rewarded and trusted are not necessarily genuine,

sense.def: be genuine and convincing; be unfaked and unartificial; be true to oneself

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:63; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:31; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: and those who are punished and suspected are not necessarily false.

sense.def: be fake; be artificial

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:32; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: There are more than seventy pupils of Confucius,

sense.def: disciples

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: they will be squeezed to death; (P.37)

sense.def: termites???white ants???; maggots?

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: they will be squeezed to death; (P.37)

sense.def: ant

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: they will be squeezed to death; (P.37)

sense.def: be sqeezed; be pressed; be crushed

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:37; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: and if man's foot does not step on the area (in which the crickes and ants are ),

sense.def: treat on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: when festering, it becomes a sore,

sense.def: deep-rooted hard-skinned ulcer

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:31; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:151

tls:text.tls:line: when festering, it becomes a sore,

sense.def: wound, laceration; dent (caused by an axe in a tree)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: some of them escape, some are caught.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: many kinds of animals run in a flock,

sense.def: generally: four-legged animal of a certain size which are liable to run away when hunted; 百獸"all manner of wild animals"; NB: one may also rear wild animals in parks 養獸

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: some of them get caught, some escape.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: When a fisherman catches fish with a squired-shaped fishing net in the rivers and lakes,

sense.def: fisherman

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: When a fisherman catches fish with a squired-shaped fishing net in the rivers and lakes,

sense.def: catch with a fishing net

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: some of them are in the net, some escape.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: Some, who have commited crimes to be punished to death, are never found out,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: Some, who have commited crimes to be punished to death, are never found out,

sense.def: crime deserving of capital punishment, capital crime

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are unfortunate encounter it and die.

sense.def: have an encounter

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:38; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: or walking on a crack bank ,

sense.def: treat on

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: The city gate of Lǔ has been decaying for a long time and was going to collapse;

sense.def: marker of the future: be about to, will; tend to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius was precautious in the extreme.

sense.def: 怒甚 "get very angry", 醉甚"be very drunk"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: If when he passed it, he encountered the collapse of the gate,

sense.def: run into (negative objects)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: "The gentleman may be unlucky, but he is never lucky;

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:64; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:33; tr. Forke 1:152

tls:text.tls:line: and the petty man has lucky, but has not unlucky."

sense.def: petty person

tls:text.tls:srcline: 小人行險以徼幸。」佞幸之徒，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: Men who depend on currying favour with rulers,

sense.def: through rhetorically polished flattery

tls:text.tls:srcline: 小人行險以徼幸。」佞幸之徒，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: Men who depend on currying favour with rulers,

sense.def: gain favour with one's superior

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: they pleased their rulers merely with their beautiful looks.

sense.def: be regarded as attractive

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: They should not be loved, but they were in the ruler's favour,

sense.def: be loved, be beloved; be the object of sollicitous care

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: They should not be loved, but they were in the ruler's favour,

sense.def: favourite status, favour; favourable treatment 有寵於

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:39; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: Than bad men went against the way, but they got honour,

sense.def: generous love> love construed as emotional generosity

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them become human, and some, beasts.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: Some of them become human, and some, beasts.

sense.def: birds and beasts; a mere animal

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: some are nobility, others humble; and some are poor, others rich.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: The rich may hoard up heaps of gold, whereas the poor may beg for his food.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: The rich may hoard up heaps of gold, whereas the poor may beg for his food.

sense.def: ask/beg (a person for food); beg for

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: A noble man may rise to the rank of a marquis, while a humble man may sinks into a state of slavery.

sense.def: slave servant> humble slave See 賤至奴僕

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:67; Yang 1999:32; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: it is because that the essential properties which human beings and animals receive is much or less.

sense.def: living creature, animals SW: 凡物無乳者｛"animals without milk, generally speaker"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:40; Beida1979:68; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:34; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: When a man of Lǔ avenged his father,

sense.def: hostility in practice, enmity in action; vendetta; hostile acts

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:41; Beida1979:68; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:35; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: and not running is equal to fearlessness,

sense.def: be on a par, at the same level MO

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:41; Beida1979:68; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:35; tr. Forke 1:153

tls:text.tls:line: The marquis Zhāo of Hán drunk fell asleep and would have felt cold,

sense.def: nodd off; rest (as on a table before one), take a nap; doze off 醉而臥; often: take a nap during the day

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: Bamboos which are several Rèns (one Rèn equal to eight feets) in height,

sense.def: bamboo

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and trees which are several arm-spans in circumference ,

sense.def: tree; timber; (small) pieces of wood

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: are cut down by artisans for use.

sense.def: carve into pieces, cut up; to tailor

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: Some are made into utensils, and are used,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and some are regarded as waste materials, and was cast aside.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and some are regarded as waste materials, and was cast aside.

sense.def: be exposed to (something bad)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: It is not because that the cook and the distiller have an intention to make them different,

sense.def: cook

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: Well done rice is kept in different baskets,

sense.def: SHI 291: ancient term for square bamboo basket, square in shape, used for carrying food

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and sweet wine is laid up in different vessels.

sense.def: savoury (and probably sweet)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: If an insect drops into a vessel,

sense.def: fall into; fall onto

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: If an insect drops into a vessel,

sense.def: vessel of any kind; also: eating utensils, the plates and pots food is served or kept in

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and if a mouse walks into a basket,

sense.def: rodents; rat; mouse

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and if a mouse walks into a basket,

sense.def: get into (e.g. rats getting into rice)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and if a mouse walks into a basket,

sense.def: SHI 291: ancient term for square bamboo basket, square in shape, used for carrying food

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: If it happens to be plucked by a physician,

sense.def: encounter the situation that S

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: If it happens to be plucked by a physician,

sense.def: a physician

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: and if it is left in the dried-up marshes,

sense.def: waterless; dried-up; dried (fish) 枯魚 "dried fish"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: some are made into swords and halberds,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: some are made into spears and hoes.

sense.def: short dagger weapon

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: some are made into spears and hoes.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: some are used as posts in bridges.

sense.def: colloquial: current from Han times: wooden bridge of considerable width

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: it may be used to light the candle,

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: or be used to burn dry grass.

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: or be used to burn dry grass.

sense.def: burn, burn down; burn in

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: or be used to burn dry grass.

sense.def: withered (of wood); dried (fish); fleshless (of bones); dried-up (of marshes)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: it may be used as foundations for halls and palaces,

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: it may be used as foundations for halls and palaces,

sense.def: lay foundations for, serve as a foundation for

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: or be used to plaster the doors of a hut.

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: or be used to plaster the doors of a hut.

sense.def: long simple hut with windows

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: It may be used to clean tripods and cauldrons,

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: It may be used to clean tripods and cauldrons,

sense.def: wash (dishes, pots and pans)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: or be used to wash decaying and smelly things.

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:154

tls:text.tls:line: or be used to wash decaying and smelly things.

sense.def: wash; clean

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: but when they are used by men,

sense.def: get exposed to Nab-ing; (meet>) marker of passivisation

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:70; Yang 1999:33; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: How much more will be pited for living creatures with their subtle vital energies!

sense.def: hold in one's mouth> encompass; have within one, contain

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:71; Yang 1999:34; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: when he was alive, he ought to have obtained the happiness of perfect and peace.

sense.def: complete peaceful happiness

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:71; Yang 1999:34; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: when he was alive, he ought to have obtained the happiness of perfect and peace.

sense.def: good fortune and happiness (also in the form of wealth...); blessings

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:71; Yang 1999:34; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:36; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: He was extremely misfortune.

sense.def: 怒甚 "get very angry", 醉甚"be very drunk"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:71; Yang 1999:34; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:37; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn still happened to meet Yáo to take over the empire, (P.42)

sense.def: even (an N)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:71; Yang 1999:34; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:37; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn still happened to meet Yáo to take over the empire, (P.42)

sense.def: run into a person, come to meet a person

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 5; Liu 1990:42; Beida1979:71; Yang 1999:34; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:37; tr. Forke 1:155

tls:text.tls:line: Shùn still happened to meet Yáo to take over the empire, (P.42)

sense.def: what has been abdicated from> the throne

tls:text.tls:line: The theories of the Mohists

sense.def: Mohism

tls:text.tls:line: The theories of the Mohists

sense.def: Han: school of thought; later also: Buddhist sect

tls:text.tls:line: whereas the classicists' theories

sense.def: Han: school of thought; later also: Buddhist sect

tls:text.tls:srcline: 秦將白起坑趙降卒於長平之下，
tls:text.tls:line: or that Bái Qǐ, the Qin general, had [all] the Zhao troops who surrendered at Chángpīng buried alive -- some

sense.def: bury alive in a pit 坑儒生

tls:text.tls:srcline: 秦將白起坑趙降卒於長平之下，
tls:text.tls:line: or that Bái Qǐ, the Qin general, had [all] the Zhao troops who surrendered at Chángpīng buried alive -- some

sense.def: surrendered, who have surrendered

tls:text.tls:line: and its multitudes of people,

sense.def: population; the population at large; human beings, humankind

tls:text.tls:line: and that mass burial in Chángpīng,

sense.def: mass burial in a ditch

tls:text.tls:line: He spoke the truth.

sense.def: this 此說之難"These difficulties with persusasion"

tls:text.tls:line: heaven's destiny played a part.

sense.def: commands of Heaven; fate

tls:text.tls:line: A state's destiny is tied to the stars.

sense.def: be tied to (CHECK ALL THESE GRAPHS FOR CONFUSION WITH 繫)

tls:text.tls:line: is like a particular year's harvest being good or bad.

sense.def: harvest

tls:text.tls:line: For life and death

sense.def: pronoun an (often deverbal) abstract noun 虛者 "as for emptiness", 仁者 "as for benevolence".

tls:text.tls:line: The inborn nature is the main factor.

sense.def: the most important point; the essential thing, the main thing

tls:text.tls:line: and if it is long, then he will (P.46)not die young.

sense.def: die young

tls:text.tls:line: if one is on one's best behavior, then luck and blessings arrive;

sense.def: occur, take place 大風至

tls:text.tls:line: and if one gives way to the emotions and desires, then ill-luck and misfortune comes.

sense.def: arise

tls:text.tls:line: One meets misfortune due to external factors

sense.def: run into things in various ways

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.3; Liu 1990:50; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:39; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: A person's nature may be commendable but his destiny ill;

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.3; Liu 1990:50; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:39; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: and another's nature deplorable, (P.50)but her destiny good.

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.4; Liu 1990:50; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:39; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: Some may act well but still get misfortune;

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.4; Liu 1990:50; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:39; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: Some may act well but still get misfortune;

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.4; Liu 1990:50; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:39; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: And some may act despicably but get good fortune,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.4; Liu 1990:50; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:39; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: And some may act despicably but get good fortune,

sense.def: either... or; or perhaps

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.6; Liu 1990:51; Beida1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: However, if one's inborn nature is good, but one's fate unlucky,

sense.def: turn out disastrously disadvantageous

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.8; Liu 1990:51; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: but meet disaster outside.

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.8; Liu 1990:51; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: how could they possibly have encountered such bad luck?

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.9; Liu 1990:51; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: For what reason, then, did they encounter bad luck?

sense.def: be exposed to (something bad)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.9; Liu 1990:51; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: For what reason, then, did they encounter bad luck?

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.9; Liu 1990:51; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: Bó Niu stayed quietly at home, but he caught a horrible disease.

sense.def: at leisure, unoccupied

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.9; Liu 1990:51; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: Bó Niu stayed quietly at home, but he caught a horrible disease.

sense.def: bad; dishonourable; offensive (words); of bad quality (clothes); malignant (of disease); foul (of smells)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.9; Liu 1990:51; Beida 1979:i1; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:42; tr. Forke 1:139

tls:text.tls:line: Bó Niu stayed quietly at home, but he caught a horrible disease.

sense.def: OBI 5: acute sickness; current state of sickness; also: xīn jí 心疾 "indisposition/illness of the heart/mind"; sickness 斯疾 temporary indisposition; falling sick

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.12; Liu 1990:52; Beida1979:i2; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:42; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: Moreover, destiny in the newborn

sense.def: as soon as, just 初生 "when he was just born, as soon as he is born, from birth"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 遭命者、初稟氣時遭凶惡也，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.13; Liu 1990:52; Beida1979:i2; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:42; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: while those with Contrary Destiny meet with bad luck when they first receive their endowment,

sense.def: be exposed to (something bad)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 遭命者、初稟氣時遭凶惡也，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.13; Liu 1990:52; Beida1979:i2; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:42; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: while those with Contrary Destiny meet with bad luck when they first receive their endowment,

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:text.tls:srcline: 遭命者、初稟氣時遭凶惡也，

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.13; Liu 1990:52; Beida1979:i2; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:42; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: while those with Contrary Destiny meet with bad luck when they first receive their endowment,

sense.def: wickedness in action

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.3.13; Liu 1990:52; Beida1979:i2; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan1997:42; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: and die young as an adult.

sense.def: die young

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.1; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: Thus if a pregnant woman eats a hare,

sense.def: pregnant, in the early stages of pregnancy

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.1; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: her child will be born with a harelip.

sense.def: be defincient with respect to, fail to meet the requirements of

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.1; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:40; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:140

tls:text.tls:line: her child will be born with a harelip.

sense.def: lip

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.2; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: "In this month

sense.def: such a (month, i.e. a second month of a year)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.2; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: "In this month

sense.def: at the time N

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.2; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: the thunder will sound.

sense.def: HF 8.10.33: thunder

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.2; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: certainly have very bad luck."

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.2; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: As for the dumb, deaf, lame and blind,

sense.def: the dumb; those who are dumb

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.2; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: As for the dumb, deaf, lame and blind,

sense.def: the deaf

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.2; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: As for the dumb, deaf, lame and blind,

sense.def: the blind; those who are blind

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.3; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: When Yángshé Sìwǒ was just (P.53)born,

sense.def: as soon as, just 初生 "when he was just born, as soon as he is born, from birth"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.4; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: -- the same kind given to Dān Zhū and Shāng Jūn [two evil men].

sense.def: be such; be a paradigmatic example; be a typical case in point; be a relevant example; be a paradigm case

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 6.4.4; Liu 1990:53; Beida 1979:i4; Yang 1999:41; Guizhou 1993:; Hunan 1997:43; tr. Forke 1:141

tls:text.tls:line: And so the rites include methods of prenatal instruction:

sense.def: concerning the foetus; pre-natal

tls:text.tls:line: His relative worth depends on these [two] phases [of training], certainly.

sense.def: this, these 此人

tls:text.tls:line: the mother is not careful not to think improprer thoughts,

sense.def: be meticulous about Ving

tls:text.tls:line: with bodily form that disgusts.

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:text.tls:line: with bodily form that disgusts.

sense.def: be quite ugly, be thoroughly ugly

tls:text.tls:line: and one will experience constant hardship without secure pleasure.

sense.def: (by litotes (see RHETORICAL DEVICES):) be unhappy; be quite dissatisfied

tls:text.tls:line: meets with an extraordinarily adverse change,

sense.def: encounter in some way or other

tls:text.tls:line: he rushed into death's domain.

sense.def: death

tls:text.tls:line: the calamity he met with accidentally

sense.def: happenstance; coincidence

tls:text.tls:line: and the pits at Chángpíng,

sense.def: mass burial in a ditch

tls:text.tls:line: Because the calamity they met with was so huge,

sense.def: happenstance; coincidence

tls:text.tls:line: meeting by chance with the proper ruler and being employed [according to one's talent].

sense.def: ruler; host; lord/ruler, owner (as being primarily in charge of territories and/or things)

tls:text.tls:line: if one does not by chance meet with a ruler who understands one's strengths,

sense.def: object pronoun, resumptive, non-contrastive: oneself, himself, herself, themselves

tls:text.tls:line: one will not get a chance to prove his mettle.

sense.def: find satisfactory evidence on; check out; test carefully; get to the bottom of (a person or a matter)

tls:text.tls:line: If, in one's behaviour, one acts contrary to the ruler,

sense.def: contrary, perverse; be at odds with each other; be at loggerheads

tls:text.tls:line: may go with destiny and luck,

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: or they may be separate.

sense.def: some... others (often hard to distinguish from "either... or"); some..., the others

tls:text.tls:line: Once the shape of the vessels is already fixed

sense.def: vessel of any kind; also: eating utensils, the plates and pots food is served or kept in

tls:text.tls:line: these cannot be reduced or added to.

sense.def: get reduced; get less

sense.def: in mutual interaction> each other, mutually

sense.def: be changed from what it is and transformed into something else (in all sorts of ways?)

sense.def: get reduced; get less

tls:text.tls:line: A pán basin can be made into a zūn-winecup

sense.def: bronze wine vessel

tls:text.tls:line: Human beings receive vital energy from Heaven,

sense.def: receive; receive passively

tls:text.tls:line: Human beings receive vital energy from Heaven,

sense.def: vital physical energies (of a person)

tls:text.tls:line: they take their places (in the world) with their physical shape

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:text.tls:line: but if they get hold of a good method or a divine elixir,

sense.def: angelica anomala, aromatic herb also used in medicine

tls:text.tls:line: their forms can undergo transformation, and so

sense.def: be changed from what it is and transformed into something else (in all sorts of ways?)

tls:text.tls:line: their predestined lifespans can be prolonged."

sense.def: allotted lifespan; life

tls:text.tls:line: their predestined lifespans can be prolonged."

sense.def: be added to

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.3; Liu 1990:60; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:47; tr. Forke 1:325

tls:text.tls:line: reptiles and snakes undergo transformation,

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.3; Liu 1990:60; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:47; tr. Forke 1:325

tls:text.tls:line: and they are turned into fish or turtles.

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.3; Liu 1990:60; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:47; tr. Forke 1:325

tls:text.tls:line: The reptiles are separated from their basic nature in a temporary change.

sense.def: inner integrity; what is genuine in one; genuine inner nature; genuine essence; one's true being

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.4; Liu 1990:60; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:47; tr. Forke 1:325

tls:text.tls:line: Officials, being cautious about this,

sense.def: be properly diligent

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.5; Liu 1990:60; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: and if they have transformed into fish and turtles,

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.6; Liu 1990:60; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326 That is not what they desire.

tls:text.tls:line: Frogs become quails, (P.60)

sense.def: kind of frog; toad

tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.7 ; Liu 1990:61; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: Gōngniú Āi of Lǔ was once laid up with a disease.

sense.def: be in bed because of N; keep in bed with (a flue)

tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.8 ; Liu 1990:61; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: who then transformed into a yellow (P.61)bear.25

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.9; Liu 1990:62; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: man's is the most exalted.

sense.def: be the most V; count as (the most) V 最為大

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.3.9; Liu 1990:62; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:46; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: man's is the most exalted.

sense.def: be noble; enjoy high status; hold a high position 最為貴,最貴,至貴

tls:text.tls:line: is to take an old man and change him into a small baby, with the

sense.def: xinlun, lunheng p. 62: old gentleman

tls:text.tls:line: is to take an old man and change him into a small baby, with the

sense.def: change from one's original form to become, turn into

tls:text.tls:line: lost teeth grow again, and

sense.def: fall; fall out; fall down

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.2; Liu 1990:62; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: Nor can they, because they have gotten hold of divine herbs

sense.def: exquisite and precious

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.2; Liu 1990:62; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: or precious medicine and consumed it, then [be able to] undergo transformations.

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.2; Liu 1990:62; Beida 1979:93; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:48; tr. Forke 1:326

tls:text.tls:line: [but only if] he could add to his basic allotment of nature,

sense.def: original nature, basic nature BUDDH: in the Buddhist context often used syn. to 佛性 Buddha-nature, 真心 True Mind, etc.

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.3; Liu 1990:63; Beida 1979:95; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:49; tr. Forke 1:327

tls:text.tls:line: If, at a certain time, one undergoes transformation,

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.3; Liu 1990:63; Beida 1979:95; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:49; tr. Forke 1:327

tls:text.tls:line: it is not the real nature with which men are endowed.

sense.def: inner integrity; what is genuine in one; genuine inner nature; genuine essence; one's true being

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.3; Liu 1990:63; Beida 1979:95; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:49; tr. Forke 1:327

tls:text.tls:line: and the stars and planets do not sink below the horizon --

sense.def: stars and constellations, heavenly bodies

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.4; Liu 1990:63; Beida 1979:95; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:49; tr. Forke 1:327

tls:text.tls:line: From time to time, men may turn into women,

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.5; Liu 1990:63; Beida 1979:95; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:49; tr. Forke 1:327

tls:text.tls:line: and then turned into a stone.

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.5; Liu 1990:63; Beida 1979:95; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:49; tr. Forke 1:327

tls:text.tls:line: became an auspicious sign of the ascendancy of Hàn.

sense.def: sign of dignity; auspicious sign

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.4.6; Liu 1990:63; Beida 1979:95; Yang 1999:47; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:49; tr. Forke 1:327

tls:text.tls:line: Silkworms eat mulberry leaves, and when they grow old,

sense.def: silkworm

tls:text.tls:line: Grubs transform into chrysali,

sense.def: transform oneself into, turn into

tls:text.tls:line: Born as infants,

sense.def: small (still breast-feeding) baby; child (of playing age)

tls:text.tls:line: they grow up to become male adults,

sense.def: adult male

tls:text.tls:line: and when old, they turn into old gents.

sense.def: old man

tls:text.tls:line: and when old, they turn into old gents.

sense.def: xinlun, lunheng p. 62: old gentleman

tls:text.tls:line: is a matter of heaven's nature.

sense.def: predicative: be so by virtue of the endowment of Nature (NOTE THAT THIS IS JUST RECORDED HERE FOR DISCUSSION IN THE CONTEXT OF THE CONCEPTIONS OF LAW OF NATURE.)

tls:text.tls:line: transforms itself in an instant

sense.def: change and be transformed, undergo all sorts of changes and transformations

tls:text.tls:line: transforms itself in an instant

sense.def: for a moment

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.5.2; Liu 1990:64; Beida 1979:97; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:50; tr. Forke 1:328

tls:text.tls:line: that they crossed over into the realm of the afterlife without dying.

sense.def: transcend this world, reach enlightenment 超脫塵世為仙。《楚辭‧遠游》："欲度世以忘歸兮，意姿睢以擔撟。" 洪興祖 補注："度世，謂僊去也。"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.5.2; Liu 1990:64; Beida 1979:97; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:50; tr. Forke 1:328

tls:text.tls:line: that they crossed over into the realm of the afterlife without dying.

sense.def: 舉世皆濁 this vulgar world; the world one lives in, this world; Rousseau: le monde; this world versus the other worlds entered by the immortals

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.5.2; Liu 1990:64; Beida 1979:97; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:50; tr. Forke 1:328

tls:text.tls:line: Suppose a person at birth has a set form called A; then

sense.def: suppose S1 then S2

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.5.2; Liu 1990:64; Beida 1979:97; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:50; tr. Forke 1:328

tls:text.tls:line: Even if he were to excel in the Way and become an immortal,

sense.def: immortals [By the way: is this used to refer to a single definite immortal?]

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.5.2; Liu 1990:64; Beida 1979:97; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:50; tr. Forke 1:328

sense.def: change from one's original form to become, turn into

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.5.3; Liu 1990:64; Beida 1979:97; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:50; tr. Forke 1:328

tls:text.tls:line: are from heaven.

sense.def: Nature; what is natural; natural endowment, natural features

tls:line.loc: LH 7.5.5; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:98; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:51; tr. Forke 1:329

sense.def: change from one's original form to become, turn into

tls:text.tls:line: The juice of a gourd

sense.def: juice

tls:line.loc: LH 7.6.3; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:99; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:52; tr. Forke 1:329

sense.def: flesh of fruits, or timber in trees

sense.def: human flesh

tls:line.loc: LH 7.6.3; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:99; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:52; tr. Forke 1:329

tls:text.tls:line: Now, suppose you ordered a man to add to or subtract from the gourd's juice, while

sense.def: juice

tls:line.loc: LH 7.6.3; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:99; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:52; tr. Forke 1:329

tls:line.loc: LH 7.6.4; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:99; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:52; tr. Forke 1:329

tls:text.tls:line: Since humans are incapable of adding to or subtracting from a gourd's juice in this way,

sense.def: be able to (loan for 能)

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.6.4; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:99; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:52; tr. Forke 1:329

tls:text.tls:line: Since humans are incapable of adding to or subtracting from a gourd's juice in this way,

tls:line.loc: LH 7.6.5; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:99; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:52; tr. Forke 1:329

sense.def: one's body (also: body of the deceased; even overall physical shape of Heaven and earth) 人形體 "human body"

tls:line.title: 論衡(en)
tls:line.loc: LH 7.6.5; Liu 1990:65; Beida 1979:99; Yang 1999:48; Guizhou 1993; Hunan 1997:52; tr. Forke 1:329

tls:text.tls:line: had their bodily forms changed,

sense.def: LH: change 性必變易

sense.def: be changed from what it is and transformed into something else (in all sorts of ways?)

sense.def: metaphysical agents

sense.def: immortal

sense.def: feather

sense.def: change from one's original form to become, turn into

sense.def: feather on wing

sense.def: feathers and wings

sense.def: immortal

tls:text.tls:line: As with a child -- absolutely everything depends upon the first years."

sense.def: 1. for the first time, initiating a tradition; 2. for a start, in the first place, initiating an ongoing process

tls:text.tls:line: If a person from that early age sets his mind on the good,

sense.def: as soon as, just 初生 "when he was just born, as soon as he is born, from birth"

tls:text.tls:line: and if a person sets his mind on the something bad,

sense.def: as soon as, just 初生 "when he was just born, as soon as he is born, from birth"

tls:text.tls:line: "The metaphor compares [human nature] to undyed silk;

sense.def: white, undyed

sense.def: dye (something N1) in (something N2)

sense.def: turn green/blue/dark grey

sense.def: cinnabar

sense.def: be changed into

sense.def: climb up, go up; also by flying: 豋天 "rise to Heaven".

sense.def: of horses (and sometimes men): be of inferior quality; not very useful

sense.def: a vulgar person; a mean person

sense.def: the disciples

sense.def: egregiously, outstandingly

sense.def: category; legal subcategory>paragraph; order of magnitude

tls:text.tls:srcline: 斯蓋變性使惡為善之明效也。
tls:text.tls:line: This is a clear proof that one can change one's basic nature for the good.

sense.def: this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point

tls:text.tls:srcline: 斯蓋變性使惡為善之明效也。
tls:text.tls:line: This is a clear proof that one can change one's basic nature for the good.

sense.def: clear; publicly well-known

tls:text.tls:line: This is a clear proof that one can change one's basic nature for the good.

sense.def: manifest proof, manifest evidence; a fact that can serve as evidence; symptom, indication; visible sign; proof in practice; proof

tls:text.tls:line: is the basic nature of soils.

sense.def: original nature, basic nature BUDDH: in the Buddhist context often used syn. to 佛性 Buddha-nature, 真心 True Mind, etc.

sense.def: grow lush, become luxuriant

sense.def: all sorts of dust and dirt

sense.def: be high and impressive, imposing (of mountains or buildings); [be higher than][CA]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 賜本不受天之富命，所加
tls:text.tls:line: Cì originally was not fated by heaven to be rich,

sense.def: originallybasically

sense.def: be changed from what it is and transformed into something else (in all sorts of ways?)

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever men are endowed with noble destinies from heaven,

sense.def: whenever

tls:text.tls:line: some in a lucky sign,

sense.def: good omens (for son); SHI 189.7: auspicious sign; GY 2.1: auspicious acts (are what one pleases the gods with)

tls:text.tls:line: from birth he was perspicacious as a god,

sense.def: show one's divine efficacy in action

tls:text.tls:line: from birth he was perspicacious as a god,

sense.def: be magically efficatious, be supernaturally efficacious; show one's supernatural talents and effectiveness

tls:text.tls:line: as he had a marvellous fate,

sense.def: divine, superhuman; numinous; divinely efficient; of divine powers; divinely inspired

tls:text.tls:line: as he had a marvellous fate,

sense.def: endowed with supernatural efficacy; endowed with supernatural dignity

tls:text.tls:line: there were evidence in portentous things.

sense.def: manifest proof, manifest evidence; a fact that can serve as evidence; symptom, indication; visible sign; proof in practice; proof

tls:text.tls:line: By heaven's destiny he had to become noble,

sense.def: by the fate of Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: Before Shùn met with Yáo,

sense.def: make the acquantance of, get together with

tls:text.tls:line: nor did the vipers and snakes bite him.

sense.def: ZUO Ai 12: bite (of rabies-mad dog biting man)

tls:text.tls:line: When he met with violent thunderstorms,

sense.def: encounter (something undesirable)

tls:text.tls:line: trod in the foot-steps of a giant.

sense.def: walk on, use as one's walking surface tread on; step on (so as to hold down)

tls:text.tls:line: trod in the foot-steps of a giant.

sense.def: footprint; traces (some examples have to be moved to n(post-N) because that N can be omitted)

tls:text.tls:line: he was abandoned in the wilds, where

sense.def: be rejected, be abandoned

sense.def: be delivered of, give birth to

sense.def: breathe on something

tls:text.tls:line: They moved him again to a horse stable,

sense.def: remove so as to put

tls:text.tls:line: They moved him again to a horse stable,

sense.def: put a determinate thing N1 in (a place N2)

tls:text.tls:line: but the horses also breathed on him,

sense.def: breath

tls:text.tls:line: but the horses also breathed on him,

sense.def: breath; breath and inner vital energies, breath and spirits; vital spirits of a person

tls:text.tls:line: ordered his mother to take him and bring him up as a slave,

sense.def: as a slave 奴養,

sense.def: colloquial: current from Han times: wooden bridge of considerable width

tls:text.tls:line: the fish and turtles dispersed.

sense.def: cross over the contextually determinate place

tls:text.tls:line: at which point the fish and turtles formed a bridge.

sense.def: colloquial: current from Han times: wooden bridge of considerable width

sense.def: by the fate of Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: so the fish and turtles helped him by forming a bridge.

tls:text.tls:line: by signs to move to other lands.49

sense.def: manifest proof, manifest evidence; a fact that can serve as evidence; symptom, indication; visible sign; proof in practice; proof

tls:text.tls:line: Guǎn Zhòng was aide to Zǐjiū,

sense.def: to help; be of use to; to support (normally rulers, but occasionally wicked persons or practices); to assist (the exercise of proper government)

tls:text.tls:line: and Bào Shūya supported Duke Huán.

sense.def: help with (the charioteering); assist in (government) assist in an official capacity (as aide, a person of superior status); ZHOULI: assist (the king) [support][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: The arrow made contact and then fell down,

sense.def: fall; fall out; fall down

tls:text.tls:line: in the courtyard of ancestral temple.

sense.def: courtyard; HF 8.6: courtyard in front of the táng 堂

sense.def: step across

sense.def: say something determinate N1 to (someone N2)

tls:text.tls:line: from Dames Wáng and Mother Wu.

sense.def: rare and late: buy on credit

tls:text.tls:line: When he was drunk,

sense.def: drink oneself drunk

tls:text.tls:line: means to make offering with song,

sense.def: song; popular song (also that of primitive peoples etc) 人聲曰歌. 歌柯也. 所歌之言是其質也. 以聲吟詠有上下如草木之有柯葉也. 故兗冀言 歌聲如柯也 Songs of humans are called gē. gē “song” is kē “branch.” The words sung, these are the substance. When using the voice one chants, the voice goes up and down, like plants and trees having stems and leaves. Thus in the Yuan and in the Jì areas they pronounce ky “sing” with a sound like kē “branch”.

tls:text.tls:line: then minor officials will turn out talented and outstanding.

tls:text.tls:line: Why is this?

sense.def: Why is this?

tls:text.tls:line: It is because the formal documents make public their proper conduct

sense.def: make public, make widely known, advertise openly; mark out

tls:text.tls:line: It is because the formal documents make public their proper conduct

sense.def: proper conduct, moral behaviour; ideal of behaviour; proper conduct

tls:text.tls:line: and because the records commend their talent.

sense.def: show up, make clear; show up in a positive light, show up the virtues of

tls:text.tls:line: and because the records commend their talent.

sense.def: promising faculties, promising talents

tls:text.tls:line: and no one will (need to) promote or praise it

sense.def: heap public praise on

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使聖國大漢有庸庸之名，
tls:text.tls:line: which would bring it about that the Holy State of our Great Hàn has a highly mediocre reputation.

sense.def: the "Holy" Country

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使聖國大漢有庸庸之名，
tls:text.tls:line: which would bring it about that the Holy State of our Great Hàn has a highly mediocre reputation.

sense.def: China (during Han dynasty AND AFTERWARDS)

tls:text.tls:line: The fault is in the fact that vulgar scholars do not cultivate a discourse based on realities.

sense.def: fault, moral responsibility for an unfortunate state of affairs

tls:text.tls:line: If in ancient and modern times there had been an uninterrupted series of Sage Kings

sense.def: the sage king (with untensed predicate)
